Once contact was made with her, a great sense of confusion and dread soon begins to course down your body as it almost appeared as if she was starting to grow right before you. A startled gasp quickly escapes her as a sudden grin forms on her face. “i-it worked!” she exclaims happily. ‘Worked!?’ you stammer in your head, unsure as to just what Kindle could’ve done to you.
115111.title: Kindle's big show!

choices: Kindle has a game in mind to play
1151112.content:
As you continue to gaze about in sheer confusion over your odd predicament, Kindle’s beaming face only seems to distance itself further away from your current position. After what seemed like a minute or so of constant shrinking, the effects slowly begin to wear off as you soon stood around half the size of one of her toes. “It worked!” Kindle’s voice echoes in a deep and thunderous tone as what sounded like a squeal of excitement echoes high above. The very volume of her now booming voice was enough to cause you to quickly cover your ears and clench your eyes shut in slight pain. And here you were thinking going to that one concert in the front row was the loudest thing in existence.

“Master, how are you down there?” Kindle asks as her loud voice was close to causing deafness in your ears.
“K-KINDLE! NOT SO LOUD!” You shout to the top of your lungs as you quickly clasp close your ears once again. Luckily, those massive ears on Kindle’s ears manage to do their job as she quickly gives a gasp of surprise.

“S-Sorry.” She mutters in a whisper like tone while cupping the sides of her mouth with her furry hands. “I got a little excited is all.” She giggles as you begin to lower your hands down from your head. “Awwww! Just look at how cute you are Master.” She coos before placing both hands upon her cheeks in a flustered position.

“Kindle…j-just what did you do to me!?” You shout completely shocked and utterly confused by her actions. “Why did you make me so small!?”

A sly toothy smirk soon draws upon Kindle’s massive face as she lets out a louder giggle. “Isn’t it neat?” she asks, as if completely disregarding your fazed attitude before her.

“Neat? You’re the size of a gigantic monster compared to me!” you retort as an irritated scowl quickly draws upon your face. Kindle was quickly taken aback by the response as she appeared to back up a couple inches in disbelief.

“You mean…you..you don’t like it?” She stutters completely dumbfounded. “I…I thought you would like being small for a bit master.”

“Like being small?” you repeat growing confused by her supposed motives. “W-What do you mean Kindle?”

“Well…you always did like giant pokemon. Right Master?” Kindle asks while gently cocking her head to the side.

“W-Well…sorta.” You reluctantly admit while averting your eyes elsewhere. When it came to your deepest secret regarding size fascination, the only other being alive, besides you, with such knowledge just happened to be Kindle herself. Being a devoted Braixen, she crossed her heart that she would keep this whole fascination a secret from everyone you knew. To this day, she still manages to keep that dark fantasy hidden away from the ears of the public. “Is…that why you decided to shrink me?” you ask piecing together the mystery.

“Ding Ding Ding.” Kindle replies giddily while giving a light applause to follow. “I’ve been trying to improve my psychic powers for the past couple of weeks in order to help create my own personal shrinking spell!” she beams with a finger pointed in a matter-of-fact manner. “Luckily Those socks managed to be the best practice item.” She chuckles softly.

“Wait…you used my socks!?” You stammer in complete surprise. Here you were wondering just what happened to every pair of sock you owned in the house. You would never have guessed they were being used as test subjects for Kindle’s little experiment.

“Errr…” Kindle’s eyes widen as a stupefied expression takes up her face. “…So, how do you like it?” she quickly asks, hoping you didn’t manage to catch her last sentence.

“It’s…different.” You admit knowing full well that Kindle was going to get a talking to later on.

“Is that a good or bad?” She asks with a head tilt to the left.

“Somewhere inbetween.” You reply still unsure what to make of being so tiny. While you were always fascinated in the idea of ginormous pokemon, truth be told, you would never have guessed that your very own Braixen would be the one to shrink you. As you take a moment to look upon your new vantage point, a great shadow suddenly begins to cast over you as Kindle slowly kneels downwards.

“Well…since you’re so small now, how about we have some fun master?” Kindle asks beaming a large excited smile.

“F-Fun?” you ask bewildered and a bit awkwardly. “J-Just what is considered fun Kindle?” you stammer, unsure just what your now ginormous Braixen had in mind.
1151112.title: A tiny problem in hand

choices: Attack of the giant Kindle! (Monster like game)
11511121.content:
“Why a game of course master!” Kindle states with a light laugh to boot.

“A-A game?” you stutter as your eyes widen in shock by all the possible idea’s Kindle could have in mind. When it came to having fun, Kindle was always one for surprises. In your case unfortunately, many of said surprises usually consisted of something either being broken or damaged inside your home. “N-now Kindle, I know you’re excited.” You reply in a meek soft tone while gently raising your hands up cautiously. “But let’s not be so reckless.”

“Oh come on Master! I’m not ALWAYS that Reckless.” She retorts with a small pouty face, obviously taking insult from your comment.

“Not so loud!” you call back as your nervous hands quickly clasp upon both your ears from her booming voice. “And I’m not saying that you’re always reckless. Just…that sometimes you forget to mind your surroundings.” You reiterate.

“But this time it will be different.” She states in a much softer tone. “With you so tiny, I’ll be triple times as careful compared to before.” She beams while pointing at herself in a proud manner.

“If only you were triple times careful all the time.” You grumble to yourself before letting out a small sigh. Knowing too well that Kindle had the upper hand in this debate in both size and tactics, you ultimately decide to play along with her so-called game. “Alright Kindle. Just what game do you have in mind?” you reluctantly ask, dreading just what could possibly be brewing in that huge head of hers.

“Well~” Kindle states in a playful, lighthearted tone as she uses her fingers to twirl her stick in a slow speed. “I was thinking…since you’re so small now, how about we try playing-“
11511121.title: Game time!

choices: The game begins, you dash away
Kindle has something in mind at the start.
115111211.content:
"Attack of the giant Kindle!" Kindle beams out with a triumphant smile and light giggle.

"...Attack...of the giant kindle?" you reply, not at all sharing the same amount of enthusiasm as her. "I...don't like the sound of this." You admit while gazing up at her beaming form before you. One could only wonder just what your now ginormous Braixen had planned for this random game she made up.

"Oh come on Master! it will be fun." she calls back, making sure to keep a slightly quiet tone to her voice. "Just think of it like that movie about that giant Charizard." she states recalling a random cheesy flick you and her watched not too long ago.

"That...really doesn't help with my view of this 'game' Kindle." You reply back, recalling all the mass destruction that occurred within the movie. If Kindle was actually planning on replicating that film, there was no telling whether your furniture would let alone apartment would survive in the end.

"It'll be fun. I promise!" she retorts with a large smile as her orange orbs were gazing down upon you. "And I promise there will be no broken furniture or burning chairs at all." she adds while raising her right hand up as if taking an oath.

"The promise is assuring." You say in an almost sarcastic tone. "Though, I'm still unsure about this game. Besides, just what are the rules?"

Upon asking, Kindle's smile seemingly grows wider as a giggle escapes her mouth. "It's easy. I pretend to be a giant monster and you simply try to avoid me!"

"That...doesn't really give me that much of an advantage..." you admit, seeing as how the Braixen girl was nearly the height of two massive skyscrapers stacked together.


"Fine then." Kindle murmurs with a small huff. "Well...how about we add some time in the game?"

"Time?" you ask raising your brow confused by her suggestion.

"Yeah! you know? set up a time limit for me to catch you." She explains more clearly. "I mean, it looks like you're clothes managed to shrink with you."

"Which I'm grateful for." you quickly interject.

"SO, that must mean your watch must still work too." she finishes as your eyes quickly trail down to your right wrist. As expected, the watch remains perfectly rested upon your skin as the hands surprisingly continued with their motion.

Despite how much you disliked the very idea of this game, you doubted Kindle would try and give you a chance to say otherwise. Plus, that pouty attack and fake tears always did the trick at tearing your heart strings. "Alright...fine." You mutter with a long sigh. "Let's try and play your game."

A loud squeal soon escapes high above as Kindle clenched her hands happily under her chin. Luckily for you though, the sound didn't manage to hurt your ears TOO much. "Thank you master!" she beams.

"Hold it!" you interject while raising your right hand up quickly. "We still need to set up a time limit."

"You're right." Kindle replies with a quick and eager nod. "how about...hmmm...ten minutes?" she suggests as her poofy tail wags feverishly behind her.

"Hah! funny." you respond back with a small scowl. "three minutes!" you state in a matter of fact manner while holding three fingers to get you point across.

"seven?" Kindle suggests with a small head cock to the right.

"Three." you restate once more still holding digits sternly.

A quick pout soon escapes Kindle as she immediately follows it up with a huff. "Fine." she replies in a defeated manner.

"Good." you state moving your arm down while nodding your head.

After a brief nanosecond, Kindle's charisma quickly returns as the smile takes up her face once again. "Alright then. Let's begin Attack of the giant Kindle!" she calls out as if presenting a show.

"Hooray..." you grumble clearly not as excited as her.
115111211.title: Attack of the giant Kindle! (Monster like game)

choices: Kindle begins to try and suck in the air below the couch.
Kindle blows a huge gust sending you flying about.
1151112111.content:
"Well...best start running master." Kindle says in a mischevious voice as an almost devilish grin contorts upon her face.

Taking no hesitation at all, you quickly make a 180 before dashing away from your massive sized Braixen. While Kindle was known to be quite the competitive type, you knew that she'd never intentionally harm you while playing about. But then again, at this small size there's no telling if you'd end up injured by complete accident. As your feet continue to dash upon the carpeted floor of your living room, you quickly scan about for some means of sanctuary from Kindle's oncoming actions. Luckily for you though, almost every single furniture piece was slightly raised from the ground, giving you the perfect chance to hide underneath with ease. Seeing as how the couch was the closest towards your location, you immediately begin to make a b-line towards the shadows before giving a tremendous leap into the darkness.

Your actions were proven successful, as upon entering under the confines of the furniture piece you were immediately greeted by the massive tremors of Kindles feet emerged outside. After four steps or so, the sudden quakes cease as you notice a huge shadow fusing with the one produced by the couch. "GRrrrrrrrr" Kindle growls, as if trying her best to impersonate the sounds of a furious gyrados...or at least attempt to. "Where is the human?" She continues her act, speaking in a low pitched voice that immediately sends a chortle right out of you. Despite her supposed 'terrifying' act, she was the least bit scary by her ridiculous voice.

"Master! come on, I'm trying my best with this." Kindle retorts with a huff, as if insulted by the small laugh you made.

"I'm sorry I'm sorry." you reply back while waving your hand dismissively. "You're just so cute when you act like that."

"Well, we'll see just how cute I am when I get you." she answers with a small chuckle of her own as a huge orange eye begins to peer from outside the couch side.

"That is if you can get me." you continue the banter in a teasing manner as Kindle couldn't help but giggle at your reply.

"Your on!" She exclaims before you soon notice her shifting her body about, allowing her snout to enter slightly underneath the edge.

"I don't think you can fit down here at that size Kindle." You state, seeing as how her size would easily cause the couch to raise upwards if not topple by crawling further inside.

"who said I'm trying to get in?" she retorts with a grin before suddenly-
1151112111.title: Gotta go!

choices: To open her mouth nice and wide again.
To lower you towards her foot.
11511121112.content:
As you remain huddled underneath the couch, Kindle's maw slowly begins to open up. "Kindle?" you stutter, unsure just what she was doing. A loud suction noise resonates from within her mouth as her jaws begin to part even more further, giving you a good view of the fleshy tunnel within. "You know...Braixen's can't use flamethrower with their maw." you jest lightly thinking it was just some act of hers. "So I wouldn't try and-" As if to retort your statement, kindle unleashes a mighty exhale from her mouth, as her lips begin to purse. The impact felt almost like you were being hit by a gust attack from a stray pidgey as your tiny body begins to tumble down the carpeted floor towards the back end of the living room furniture piece.

Three or four tumbles after the blast, the dark confines of the shadowed couch bottom disappears as you were soon out in the open. Dizzied, you carefully attempt to stand up on your feet as your brain wracked about in your skull. Upon giving a quick head shake, you once again find yourself cast under another shadow, one you weren't hoping to encounter. "What were you saying Master?" Kindle asks as he hands were besides her hips in an almost spunky like position. "Errr..." you murmur, seeing as how the massive Braixen was now but a few yards away from your position. "Oh come on! T-That's not fair!" you shout seeing as how escape was a complete impossibility now.

Kindle simply giggles at your cry as she soon kneels down to a crouch. "Looks like I win~" she boasts as her white furred hand immediately stretches out towards you. Her huge fingers quickly coil around you like an ekans to a ratata as your body was soon suspended upwards towards her beaming face. A giggle emerges from the giddy fox as she closes her eyes blissfully. "Now..." she begins as if attempting to imitate some sort of television narrator. "The tiny human is now at the mercy of Kindle-Zilla!" "unfortunately..." you groan under your breath, not sharing the same exuberance as her. "Just what will Kindle-zilla do now?" she asks, as one of her fangs protruded out from her lips.

"Ermmm...let the human go and assist mankind and pokemon alike?" you reply meekly as Kindle simply chortles at your suggestion. "Silly master." She says returning back to her normal voice. "Monster's don't do that." she giggles. "You remember what they do in the movies don't you?" "that...depends on what movie's you're talking about." you answer as a feeling of dread begins to befall you. "Well~" Kindle's smile starts to grow, as if anticipating this part of her game. "Monsters usually crush people." she says while gazing down and looking down at her black furred feet. As if to put emphasis on her words, her right leg begins to raise upwards as her three toes wiggle playfully below. "That-"
she adds before placing her foot back down on the floor and pulling you closer to her snout. "and they eat them too." She finishes as her mouth soon begins to open wide, releasing a blast of her warm fruity breath before your body.

"Y-You're joking!" you stutter in horror as your back was as far away from the Braixen's huge pink maw. "Am I?" Kindle asks with the mischievous grin on her face. "This isn't funny anymore Kindle!" you shout, nervous that the whole power, size idea has gotten straight into her head. "I could get seriously hurt you know!?" Kindle gives off another light laugh as she pulls you even closer towards her snout, to the point that you were almost touching the tip of her nose. "Oh come on Master. trust me on this." she insists with the same giddiness as when you first shrunk. "Besides, I already thought of what to do." she boasts. "That doesn't help make me anymore calmer!" you retort with a scowl.

Kindle couldn't help but snicker at your alarmed state as she soon begins-
11511121112.title: Caught by Kindle-zilla

choices: Spat out right back on her hand
115111211121.content:
Your heart nearly froze as you soon notice Kindle start to open her maw as wide as possible. As her lips began to part, a great gust of her warm fruit scented breath blasts head on at you. Below you was the pink confines of her mouth, consisting of her slightly sharp fangs and her wriggling tongue behind the lower stalagmites. "Kindle! cut it out!" you shout in utter annoyance now struggling about in her furred hands. "This isn't funny anymore! put me down!" you order as Kindle simply gives a light giggle in response to your futile escape.

"Come on Master, we're still playing~" she speaks in a sing song voice, before pulling you even closer to her mouth. "Besides, Kindlezilla won this round, so kindlezilla gets to do as she wants." she adds in a matter of fact tone before soon opening her mouth once more.

"Kindle! I swear if you don't-" Your words were soon cut short as your Braixen simply shoves you straight into her maw with a chortle. Inside the depths of the slimy cavern, you immediately shudder at the odd slimy texture of her tongue as it quickly lifts your lower half upwards towards the center of the muscle. "Kindle!" you shout in utter annoyance as your whole world soon begins to turn about from the motions of her tongue below. Helpless, you find yourself tossed all about the squishy surface of her mouth, from the inner sides of her cheeks to the roof of her mouth. all the while listening to your pokemon letting out satisfied murrs and giggles of giddiness. "k-Kindle!" you try to call out once more as the motions of her tongue ride made it nearly impossible to string a coherent sentence together.

After nearly a minute, or so you believed, of nonstop bouncing about, the motions soon begin to die off as you lie limply upon the saliva coated muscle completely disoriented. "Just wait until I get out..." you mumble under your breath before suddenly feeling the tongue make one good gesture upwards. To your upmost surprise, you soon find yourself-
115111211121.title: A braixen's taste test

choices: Kindle uses Psychic to get you out.
Kindle decides to eat some something first.
1151112111212.content:
Kindle's tongue motioned upward. You thought she was going to finally let you out, but instead you could see the view of outside her mouth change. You barely had time to recognize it was the ceiling by the time you started sliding backwards down the slimy tongue to the back of her throat. "K-Kindle!" Was all you managed to yell before a massive gulp rippled all around you and pulled you to the entrance of her esophagus. You slowed down for a brief second before another gulp resonated around you, starting your descent down her throat. Flesh pulsated around you as peristalsis slowly transported you down to her stomach, the sound of Kindle's heartbeat getting gradually louder and intermixing with the sounds of wet muscle rubbing against your body. You feel your feet press against something before it opens up, dropping you with a splash into her stomach.

Unable to comprehend what just happened, you just sit there in her belly dumbfounded. Kindle just ate you. The smell of her stomach was extremely sharp and bitter, but had the faint scent of the berries she likes to eat. You even think there's still some down here as your foot presses against something squishy in the hot, humid chamber. The cacophony of sound all around you drove home that you were deep inside the body of your Pokemon. Strange, wet squelching noises surrounded you as the fleshy walls of her stomach shifted and her digestive system did its thing, her heartbeat drumming away up above. You jump as you hear a muffled voice. "Oh, Master, you're so tasty!" The stomach walls shift and compress slightly as she rubs her belly. "A worthy snack for Kindlezilla!"

"K-Kindle?" You meekly call out. You never thought for a second that Kindle would do anything to harm you, but sitting there coated in her digestive juices you were actually having second thoughts. When you get no reply you call out again while pushing against the slimy stomach wall. "Kindle!" After several seconds with no reply you realized she probably couldn't hear you down here. You lay back onto the soft walls of her stomach. You had actually fantasized about being in the belly of a giant Pokemon from time to time but you never expected it to actually happen. It filled you mixture of conflicting emotions. You kind of liked the sensations and sounds as her stomach caressed you in a careful dance of ultimate dominance, but the sense of impending doom from the thought of being digested was overpowering. In an attempt to get her attention you push yourself hard against her stomach, eliciting a moan from Kindle that reverberated all around you.

"Having fun in there, Master?" She cooed as you felt her rub her belly again. "Don't worry, I'll get you out of there before you turn to Kindle food!" You start to slide about her stomach as she shifts about, her giggling echoing up above you. With the combination of heat, humidity and physical effort to not fall face first into a pool of digestive acid you were becoming extremely tired. You only hoped she would get you out of here soon.
1151112111212.title: Eaten by Kindlezilla

11511121112121.content:
You could feel the fleshy walls around you shift as Kindle pushed against her gut in various places, letting you stew in the depths of her belly for a while longer before she finally spoke. "Okay, Master." She said softly. "It's about time I try and get you out of there!"

You gave a sigh of relief at the revelation. The whole ordeal of getting eaten was... Interesting to say the least. The complete dominance Kindle had over you, the adrenaline rush from literally being eaten alive, the strange fleshy environment. You could feel fear as your instincts scream at you but for the most part it was overshadowed by the overpowering sense of awe from being inside your beloved Pokemon's body. Saying that, though, you couldn't stay here forever. As if to support that point the fleshy walls around you contracted and let out a long, drawn out groan. "Yeah, I think that's for the best!" You yell out to Kindle. You could swear the puddle of acids at the bottom of her stomach was rising a little bit as another gurgle sounded out. It was as if her stomach finally realized that there was 'food' in it.

"On it!" Kindle cheerfully sung.

"And how, exactly, are you planning on getting me out of here?" You ask her.

"Psychic!" She exclaims as a dim flickering light illuminates the slimy cavern. For the first time you could actually see your surroundings as the psychic energy reflected off the slick interior. The walls were constantly shifting and the pool of acids and digesting food at the bottom of her stomach looked exactly like it felt. Gross. The flickering light dissipated and appeared in a different area of the stomach directly above a juicy piece of fruit. It rose in the air for a little bit before it splashed back down, splattering you with bits of berry mush. Brushing it off, you continued to sit in the sweltering heat as she levitates random bits of food and acids around you. The sharp air was getting more and more difficult to breath in so you spoke up.

"Are you okay up there, Kindle?" You speak out as you push against her gut. "Kinda getting digested here."

"There!" She bellowed triumphantly as the flickering light suddenly enveloped your body. A massive rush of vertigo overtakes you as you slowly float upwards until you hit the top of her stomach. As your body got pushed against the fleshy ceiling it felt like it just suddenly opened up and you found yourself getting pushed through it. As you drifted up her esophagus you feared that you were going to just drop back down as Kindle fought with her gag reflex. Thankfully, you kept going up and eventually you could see light again as you exited her throat and arrived back in her mouth. As she breathed in you jumped as the cool air hit your skin, the room temperature air feeling like an arctic breeze after being trapped in her boiling belly.

Before long a pair of white paws plucked you out of the giant Braixen's mouth. You tried to adjust your eyes to the light as Kindle coughed and spluttered. "That was so gross!" She whined. "I think I'm gonna get heartburn..."

"Poor you." Was all you could manage to say as you leaned back against her fingers trying to recuperate. As she used her free hand to wipe her face clean her eyes rested down at you before she broke into a huge grin.

"You're pink!" Kindle exclaimed. She was right, looking down your skin was completely pink, obviously irritated by the corrosive stomach acids.

"You're lucky I'm not just a skeleton right now." You playfully jab back at her. Looking around, Kindle had thankfully thought to bring you to kitchen sink so you could get washed off. You could hear the tap stir to life as she turned one of the handles, drops of water falling down into the plugged sink.

"So, what was it like getting eaten by Kindlezilla?" She said as she grinned down at you.

"It was pretty cool." You say without thinking. A blush makes your face in pinker as you realized you just confessed that you enjoyed being eaten by your Pokemon as Kindle looks down at you in obvious amusement. "W-well, it was kind of scary at first but since it was you that ate me I knew you wouldn't just leave me in there, I guess."

Kindle giggles as she turns the tap and stops the flow of water. You could swear you see her also blushing underneath her fur. "Thank you!" She said as she lowered you down into the sink. "I think we better clean those juices off you before you melt, though." Slowly she eased you down into the cool water as the cool water washed over you. Kindle had left the tap on long enough so that the water came up to your waist allowing you to fully submerge your body as you sat down, letting you purify yourself of the clinging residue from her stomach. You continued bathing for a while as Kindle lovingly stared at you from above as she leaned over the sink. "Feeling refreshed, Master?"

"Much better. The cool water's a nice change compared to your belly" You say as you continue relaxing. "It was like a sauna cranked up to a hundred!" Your body was slowly returning to it's naturally colored state and you surprisingly found that your skin was very smooth. "And I think the stomach acids actually burned away all the dead skin or something."

"I could open up my very own spa!" She joked.

"If you took out the risk of the customers being added to your waist-line I'm sure you would be very popular."

You let yourself relax into the cool water for a little bit longer before you signal to your Braixen to pick you up. "So, what do you wanna do now, Master?" Kindle asked as she raised you up to her face. The whole 'being eaten' ordeal had left you feeling a bit tired. Since she is asking you could probably think of some other shrunken shenanigans to do, but having a nice sleep in her soft fur also sounds really appealing right about now.

What do you do?
11511121112121.title: Kindle uses Psychic to get you out.

choices: Kindle decides to let you out finally
She continues to eat her snack blissfully
11511121112122.content:
As you struggled to maintain balance within the lurching fleshy sack that was Kindle's belly, your body begins to wallow about in an almost rhythmic pattern as you brushed repeatedly against the sides of the slimy chamber. "Kindle! What's going on!?" You shout in horror, unsure if it was her actually moving, or her stomach preparing to initiate it's digestive process. "Relax Master! I'm just walking is all." Kindle replies quickly to your relief as her booming voice practically echoes from above.

"Are you heading to the sink?" You ask, as your hopes begin to rise by the sudden thought of being freed. "Atta girl! Just head right to the kitchen and-" "And get me a quick Snack!" She interjects in an almost sing-song like voice. "A...quick snack?" You repeat, stupefied by her sudden cut in your words. "K-Kindle! This is no time to be thinking of food! Let alone with me being inside of your stomach right now!" You add, spewing out the words in a flustered tone as the surrounding soon begins to calm down slightly, no doubt due to her ceasing with her strides. "Oh come on Master! It's been hours since we ate breakfast and I'm hungry." She states in a voice where you could only imagine a pout emerge on her lips. As if to prove her hunger was true, an almost defeaning roar sounds off around you causing the slimy walls to quickly wiggle and writhe. "See!? Even my belly agrees with me. Besides, you still sound fine in there." She murmurs in a nonchalant manner.

"Kindle! I'm serious! You better let me out right this minute!" You shout, as your rage was starting to get the best of you. "If you don't, I swear you'll never!-" Once again your words were cut short as an almost melodic tune was soon being hummed above, as Kindle was no doubt perusing about the fridge for a meal. "Let's see....canned meat? Yek! Whipped cream?...hmmm...maybe~ AH! Here we are!" She beams, causing you to gaze up at the high sphincter leading to her throat. "Kindle?...what do you have with you?" You grumble both nervous and enraged that she deliberately ignored your words. Past the opening, an echoing *GULP* Resonates as you slowly start to back up, unsure just what your Braixen was sending down. Your curiosity was soon answered as a small Berry, to her at least, slides its way down and plops right into the digestive juices.

"Ughh! Kindle!" You growl as you swipe some of the excess droplets caused by the splash. "Mmhhh Mmhhh Mhmm!~" Kindle beams. "I think I might have a few more." She says aloud. "Wha? Kindle don't! If you do, I might be buried underneath all these berries!" You quickly intervene. The only question was whether she would listen to reason, or her own hunger?
11511121112122.title: A braixen's gotta have a snack.

choices: Take a nap and pretend she forgot he was in there
More fun with her tiny master
115111211121222.content:
As you sit in Kindle stomach watching the berry being digested and why wasn't you being digested but before you could do anything you hear what sound like a fridge door close and your whole world started shaking and you was getting tossed around like a sack of potatoes.

On the outside world, Kindle was having a lot fun messing with in her stomach, she knew you wouldn't be digested so she thought she could have more fun with you and if she lucky you might let her eat you again, Kindle decided to close the fridge door and the grabbed the bowl of berries and the whip cream and headed to the living room.

All suddenly everything stopped for you for a brief second and then it was like someone turn gravity off and you went flying in the air and then you crashing back on the ground he was just happy that the stomach was soft as anything, you guessed Kindle just jump on the couch and then you heard the TV turned on.

Kindle looked at the couch and with a big smile on her face, she jumped on the couch and she landed on the couch you picked up the remote for the TV and turned it on started flicking through see anything good was on I left it on a pokémon Comedy Channel.

By now you have guessed that you was safe inside Kindle stomach, you also guessed that Kindle was watching the comedy channel which always made Kindle laugh a lot which wasn't good for you where you was what made matters worse was used I'd seen barries coming down from the skies above you , as you tried to dodge the falling berries you could see some of them had whip cream on them.

Back on the outside world Kindle was feeling a bit not including her master in her belly, Kindle was trying to search decide what to do next should you take a quick nap and maybe she could pretend that she forgot he in there when she wakes up or she could pop to the shops to get some dinner in or play around a bit with her master.
115111211121222.title: She continues to eat her snack blissfully

115131.content:
“I gotta get home soon…” your mind repeatedly shouts in your head as you quickly pace yourself down the desolate streets. While there really were no records of crimes occurring at night within your town, with all the stray Pokémon wandering about, you definitely didn’t want to take any chances staying out too long. After several minutes of jogging down the lamp lit sidewalks of your neighborhood, you finally manage to enter within your humble home. “Finally.” You mutter under your breath while giving out a long sigh. “I really got to stop going out so late.” You murmur to yourself before gazing down the dark recesses of your hallway. Amidst the darkness, two bright red eyes orbs soon emerge at the far end of the dark abyss, slowly inching their way closer to you.

While the sight of the gleaming orbs was enough to make the strongest of men faint in shear terror, you were all too familiar with this sight. With a small chuckle, you reach your right hand out towards the nearest wall to flip a switch. With the sound of a click, the whole entryway illuminated revealing your ever so loyal Ninetales walking straight towards you. “Nine!” she cries out in a happy tone, no doubt glad you were back home. “Hey there Zoey.” You chortle before kneeling down to receive a loving nuzzle from the nine tailed vulpine. As you begin to scratch behind Zoey’s furry ears, an audible murr emerges from her throat as she lays her head against your wrist. “Sorry it took a while to get here.” You say in an apologetic tone.

“That’s fine master.” The voice of a young woman, about 18 or so emanates nearby. If there was one thing that made Zoey stand out from the other Pokémon you knew, it was her unique psychic abilities. While Zoey couldn’t speak like a normal human, she was more than capable of talking telepathically to humans. When you first discovered her unique ability years ago, to say you were startled was a complete understatement. Over time though, you managed to get used to it and even chat with her as if she was a human friend. “So why did you take so long to get back here?” Zoey asks as she retracts her head and tilts it in a curious fashion.

“Oh…you know.” You reply while awkwardly shrugging your shoulders. “I’ve just been busy and all.” You admit trying to hide the truth of your uncertainty outside. “I’m guessing it was the work that was long…and not the trip home?” Zoey asks as a small smile creeps on her face. “wha?” you stammer with surprised eyes. “You came running on home again…right?” she asks with a rather smug look on her face. “I wasn’t running.” You retort with an irritated scowl growing on your face. “Then how do you explain coming home and breathing so heavily?” Zoey counters as she extends her neck towards you. “Hey, it can be dangerous out alone, okay?” you reply with a long annoyed sigh. “Oh come on now! You’re just being paranoid is all.” Zoey says with a giggle to follow.

“Maybe, or maybe not. I’m just glad to be home.” You sigh while rising up to give a small stretch. “So, what will you be doing tonight?” she asks while following you into the kitchen. “Good question.” You reply while rummaging through the cabinets for a bag of chips to snack on. “Maybe eat a bit and get some sleep.” You shrug while digging into the bag to pull out a handful of chips. “Aren’t you going to go on that…Computer tonight?” Zoey asks curiously, as she watches you munch away. “I don’t think so…why?” you ask while gulping down the contents in your mouth. “Well…you usually look at those pictures of giant people and Pokémon.” Zoey states, nearly causing you to choke on your small meal. “W-what are you talking about!?” you stammer, shocked that Zoey would be able to know about such a thing.

“You know? The pictures of the huge humans and Pokémon’s.” She repeats again. “I don’t know what you’re talking about.” You immediately retort as you place the bag back in the cabinet. “Oh come on now Master! You can’t lie to me.” Zoey states as she approaches you. Your blood nearly freezes as the secret fascination you’ve been hiding for years was now uncovered thanks to you’re very own Pokémon companion. “I knew it!” she shouts with a smile, managing to make you jump up a bit. “Just by that look on your face I can tell you’re lying.” Zoey says in a confident tone. “Listen. Don’t tell anybody, alright?” you mutter, hoping that Zoey wouldn’t blurt out this secret to the whole town. “Your secret’s safe with me Master.” She says before proudly raising her head up and nodding.

“Though…why are you so nervous about it?” she asks before lowering her head and cocking it to the side. “It’s…not a normal thing.” You vaguely answer, unsure just how you would be able to fully explain it to her. “Well…Giant Pokémon and Humans aren’t normal things.” She admits with a giggle, promptly causing you to let out a small chuckle. “Though… I do think it’s pretty neat.” She admits to your utter surprise. “Wait…what?” you stammer, taken aback by her sudden comment. “I said the whole giant thing is pretty neat.” She repeats while gazing up at you. “I mean, it almost reminds me of those monster movies we watch now and then.” She adds with a small chuckle.

Zoey’s words came as a complete surprise to you. Never before did you think you’re own Ninetales would find interest in size changing. “So…you’re not weirded out by it?” you ask growing more surprised by the second. “Nuh-uh.” Zoey shakes her head. “I mean, it does sound really fun.” She giggles. “Fun?” You repeat dumbfounded. “Yeah! Like, me wandering about as some ginormous Pokémon.” She chuckles before walking about with long strides, as if roleplaying a scenario. “I would look down at all the small humans and Pokémon, and…Heh! I don’t even know what next.” She laughs as her head was lowered to the ground, as if she was actually gazing down at a tiny town. A small laugh escapes your mouth as well as a blush from the reenactment. “I’m sure you would be an interesting giant Pokémon.” You reply as she raises her head to prance towards you. “Well…Maybe I can be.” She says with a grin on her face. "Can...be?" You stammer gazing down at her with bewilderment.
115131.title: Secret's out

choices: Zoey shrinks you down quite a bit (a couple inches tall)
Zoey ends up shrinking you down alot! (Around an inch tall)
1151311.content:
Zoey’s last statement sent a veil of confusion before your brain as she smiles up at your form ever so eagerly. “Errr…what exactly do you mean by can be?” You ask with a furrowed brow as a giggle erupts from the vulpine Pokémon’s body. “Well, what if I told you that I know a way to make me look big?” she asks, immediately piquing your interest and abashed state. “Make you look…big?” you repeat growing interested yet slightly suspicious by her odd words. “Come on Zoey, you know there’s no real way to make you grow.” You chuckle as your brain kept a stable and realistic mindset. To your surprise however, Zoey begins to join in on the bout of laughter. “Who said I would grow?” she asks as her crimson eyes seemingly pierce through your body.

“C-Come again?” you ask as your small laugh gets cuts off by the retort. “I’m not talking about me growing.” She says with a light giggle as her four legs slowly prance their way towards you. “I’m talking about you being small!” She states as her giggle soon turns into a small laugh. Upon hearing that statement, a deep shade of red begins to draw upon your cheeks as your heart rate quickly begins to race. Could Zoey really have a means of making you tiny sized? A dream you’ve been fantasizing before your computer screen for years now? “A-and just how would you be able to do that?” you ask as a normal neighborhood dweller would to some random telemarketer.

A loud burst of laughter soon escapes Zoey as she watches your nervous and suspicious state before her. “My, you seem to really like the idea Master.” She says between bouts of breath. “I mean, why else would you be asking so much?” she asks to your upmost embarrassment. “W-well…” you begin while gently averting your eyes to the kitchen tiles. “It does sound interesting.” You reply clumsily. Zoey’s laugh continues for a brief few moments before she finally raises her head to gaze at you. “Well, since you’re so curious.” She smirks as a sudden odd sensation begins to freeze your body in place. “Wha?” you mutter as you felt your entire form incapable of moving any joints or muscles about. With wide eyes, you immediately begin to notice that you were slowly rising from the floor ever so slightly. “I am a psychic Pokémon you know?” Zoey asks as you gaze upon her now glowing, illuminous orbs. In a mere second or so, you soon regain control of your body as your two feet cause a small ‘Thud’ to erupt from below.

“Point taken.” You reply as you try to regain a calm composure from the event. “but…just how will you’re psychic powers make me small?” you ask, growing more weary of her so called idea. Immediately, Zoey makes her way right up to your open hand to and lowers her head to nuzzle against it. “Trust me master.” She says in a tone both cheery yet warm. The blush on your face only manages to grow a shade deeper seeing as how Zoey really did seem willing to carry out your fantasy. “F-fine, alright then.” You say with a small nervous sigh, trying your best to hide your inner giddiness from her. “But might I ask why you’re doing this?” you ask curiously. “Isn’t it obvious?” Zoey giggles as she retracts her head from your hand. “I’m doing it for you master.” She answers.

A great waft of appreciation and sheer joy rushes through your body as you kneel down to ruffle the top of her head. “Thanks Zoey.” You reply sincerely as a huge warm smile forms on your face. “That…and I thought it would be fun.” Zoey adds with a small laugh immediately causing you to join in. “Right Master.” Zoey says as the small light moment ended. “I’ll need you to remain standing in place while I do my work.” She instructs as you eagerly nod back in reply. “Roger.” You call out as you watch her walk a few yards further down the kitchen’s interior. “Alright then…” Zoey smiles as her red eyes slowly begin to glow, emitting a bright, dazzling aura. “Here we go!”
1151311.title: We are good to go.

11513112.content:
As the strange aura begins to fill up the room, your eyes were completely fixated upon Zoey’s form. Her crimson orbs glittered violently as if hypnotizing your mind briefly. As you stand in a dumbfounded state, what seemed like a small gale soon starts to form around you. The strength of the wind only seemed to increase with each passing moment. Soon enough, the sudden power of her psychic force ends up being so great that you had to stagger back a bit from a sudden release of her energy. As you quickly manage to recollect yourself from the sudden pushback, the red tint within Zoey’s eyes quickly shifts the entire room a scarlet almost foreboding tone. A low growl emanates within her throat before she soon releases out her common pokemon cry in a determined if not fierce tone.

A sudden red flash soon overtakes your vision before everything soon shifts into a pure white. One nanosecond later and the bright hue immediately vanishes and is replaced by a pitch-black tone. Time somehow freezes, as you can’t seem to feel your limbs within this strange void. While consciousness was still enabled within this strange state, you can’t seem to comprehend just where you were let alone what just occurred. After what seemed like minutes of pure silence, a faint voice begins to resonate around you.

“Master?” a faint voice calls out in an almost whisper like volume. “Master.” The voice repeats once more, with a bit more clarity. The tone and manner of speech was unmistakable. The voice calling out was none other than Zoey.

“Zoey?” you mutter in a drowsy tone as the darkness surrounding you slowly begins to fade into light.

“Master. Can you hear me?” Zoey asks once more in an obviously concerned tone. The great light manages to cause a groan to escape your form as the white hue blinds your vision momentarily. After a second or two, your eyes slowly begin to adjust as blurry colors soon begin to form before you.

“Nghhh...uhh…wha?” you murmur, confused by what just occurred. A couple of experimental blinks soon return your sight, as you found yourself gazing up at what appeared to be the ceiling of your kitchen. “Zoey?” you mutter as you slowly try to move your arms about. Your whole body seemed to be rather numb from the odd experience. A slight tingle resonates within some muscles of your limbs, though not too much to cause pain to radiate about. With a few experimental movements, you soon manage to rise up in a sitting position before placing your right hand upon your forehead. “ughhh…what happened?” you mutter.

“Master, are you alright?” Zoey’s voice asks within the recesses of your mind.

“Y-yeah, I’m good Zoey.” You reply as you give a small groan.
“Thank goodness! I thought something terrible happened.” She says following it up with a relieved sigh. “I was afraid I might’ve used too much of my power on you.”

“Too much of your power?” you stammer before raising your head up to look about. “What do you-“ A loud gasp quickly escapes your mouth as your vision shifts towards the left of your position. Before you was what seemed like a building size paw connected to a massive cream furred leg the size of a skyscraper. As your head ascends upwards, your mouth begins to drop in shock as you find yourself before Zoey’s now ginormous form. “H-Holy!-“ you stammer scrambling back in sheer shock from her new size. “Z-Zoey…” you stutter. “y-you’re!-“

“Huge?” her voice asks in a somewhat cheery attitude. “Yes. Seems like my psychic powers did manage to shrink you down quite a bit.” She states with a small giggle.

“S-So it seems.” You reply back, still taken aback by what was occurring before you.

“So master...” Zoey says as her huge vulpine head slowly begins to descend until her snout was yards above your form. “What do you think?”

“What do I think?” you mutter. “I…I think this is amazing!” you admit promptly causing a small laugh to escape her.

“I’m glad you like it.” She states in a wholehearted voice. “Now…since your tiny sized, is there anything you have in mind?”

“Anything I have in mind?” you ask taken aback by her question. “w-what do you mean?”

“Well, you HAVE been fantasizing about being small before a pokémon.” She replies with a smile on her face. “So now’s your opportunity to try whatever you want on me.”

The last comment causes a deep blush to form on your face as you take a brief moment to avert your eyes to the tiled floors. “A-Are you sure about this Zoey?” you stammer. “I-I mean, I don’t want you to do something you don’t want to.” While the idea of getting to do what you always wanted to do at such a tiny size did sound amazing, you couldn’t help but feel a twinge of guilt seeing as how you were about to try it on your good nine tailed companion.

“I’m fine with it Master.” Zoey replies as her head gives a small nod in response. “Besides…I’m curious to see just what you have planned.” She giggles causing the blush on your face to grow deeper.

“W-Well….if you say so.” You reply before turning your eyes back up to her and nodding. “Okay then.”

“Right, so what does my little master have in plan?” she asks as the massive tails behind her slowly begin to wag happily..

11513221.content:
The snow storm rages outside the window. Nobody would be able to resist to this chilly atmosphere, but this just gives you the perfect excuse to cuddle up with your nice, warm pokemon, Victini, a blanket wrapped around your bodies as you sit on the couch, petting her ears, making her purr in pleasure.

You met her many years ago, in a lonely forest you were casually getting through. She literally crashed into you trying to get away from a Zangoose that was chasing her. She hid behind you, shaking just like you. You had to run all the way out of the forest, Victini hanging to your shoulder while you ran for it.

Once out of that forest, she refused to let go of the 'human who saved me' and you simply decided to bring her home with you. You've been living together since then. A quiet murr brings you back on the couch.
"You're enjoying this, aren't you?" you ask playfully. She nods with energy, smiling happily.

You chuckle.
"I can tell you're enjoying yourself as well, master." she retorts with a smile.
"Can't deny it." you reply, sending her into giggling, high pitched sounds threatening your ears. Just like always after all.

Your pokemon returns to relax after a bit, snuggling closer to you.
You yawn.
"I think I'm going to take a nap, Victini." you say, while stopping your petting.
"Awwww." she whines for the lack of fingers stroking her furry ears. You give a small chuckle before relaxing.

The only noise you can hear is the storm outside. Instinctively, you hug your pokemon. The last thing you hear before blacking out is an excited whisper.
"Sleep tight master. When you wake up, you'll feel completely different."a giggle follows the sentence, before you drift off.

You wake up many hours later. Rubbing your eyes, you yawn.
"That was a good rest." you whisper, stirring. Your couch seems softer than before, but you don't think much about it. At least, not until you find out Victini is no longer on your lap. You can still feel her comforting warmth emanating from somewhere near your body. Inspecting around, you notice, to your great surprise, that you've been laying all the time...
11513221.title: Let's go with Victini.

115132221.content:
It's a nice warm summer evening outside, a bit humid but that's because it just rained. The path to your house is a bit wet but nothing that isn't manageable. With a bag holding two bowls of ramen in tow, you grab your house keys out of your pocket and unlock the doors to your house. It clicks and opens as you step inside the already lit up house.

"You're home!" A cheerful voice can be heard across the house, who you can only assume is Cinderace. You see Cinderace run towards you, as she hug tackles you. She doesn't knock you down though the force of the hug does knock you back a bit. Funny, she's about eye level to your chest but she is pretty good at making up for that size.

"It's great to be back, though I wish I was back sooner. Got held out at work today." You laugh, "I got some ramen for an easy dinner tonight if that's alright with you." Cinderace lets go of her hug on you and nods her head. "Great!"

It takes no time at all to get the ramen ready. All it really needs to do is set while the boiled water does its work. "I'm going to freshen up a bit," You tell Cinderace, as you head to the bathroom. A simple wash of the face and hands, plus a change of clothing into some pajamas, and you're all set.

Walking into the kitchen, looks like the bowls are already done and Cinderace is eating hers at the table. You grab yours and join Cinderace at the table. Huh, the ramen tastes a bit... funny. Maybe they changed the flavor of it or added a new ingredient? Either way, both you and Cinderace finish off the food, and sit on a couch by the TV.

"So comfy..." Cinderace leans on you, resting her head on your arm like a pillow. It's honestly quite cute. Eyes going heavy, you feel like going to sleep as well, but then you feel something. You don't now how to describe it other than... something. Maybe it was the ramen.

It's probably nothing, you think as you begin to try and clock out again, but that feeling wont go away. Wait, does Cinderace feel a bit heavier? It feels like Cinderace is leaning on you more and more. You look at your shoulder to see that Cinderace is now equal to your size, if not bigger. What is going on?

"Cinderace." Shaking the bunny awake, you notice that you are getting smaller. She groggily lifts her head up off of you. She looks at you, and jumps in surprise at your new size.

"Oh wow, that stuff works fast!" Cinderace says in surprise. Wait, stuff? "You probably have questions... Here." She lifts you up onto her lap, just like how you did when she was a Scorbunny. In fact, you are probably the size of one right now. "So while you were gone to work, I decided to go snooping a bit in your room. I found out through your computer that you have a thing for shrinking."

Ah, that sounds about right. "But how did you shrink me?" You ask.

"Ah, that part. I found a kind of powder that inflicts shrinking, though I heard it is kind of strong. I put it in your food when you went to change."

Strong? "Wait, how much did you add?"

She responds with...

115211.content:
You and Oshawott have been great friends ever since you found her in one of those "Take Me" boxes whenever you were five. You two, since then, have been inseparable, always working together and supporting each other for years.

Present Day:

"Wake up, master, wake up!" You hear Oshawott yell, shaking your body.

"Hbrhbgbrh, give me five minutes." You mumble, pushing your face back into the pillow.

"C'mon, you said that five minutes ago." Oshawott complains, pulling your arm off the bed. You chuckle and sit up in bed, facing Oshawott.

"Alright, I'm up." You smiled. "What is it?"

"I need to show you something I found!" Oshawott answers, holding up her paw up. "It's gonna be one second for me to get it, I promise you will love it." Oshawott then bolts out of the room, into the hallway.

After a few minutes of waiting, Oshawott comes back with a strange cyan stone in her hands. "I got this from an old man at the hills. He said it grants something special." Oshawott says, handing the stone to you. "He told me that you need to kiss it or put it on your mouth of whatever. C'mon, let's try it."

"What the "something special" part about this?" You ask wearily. Oshawott is your friend, heck, even your family, but she can be an idiot sometimes.

"Now that's a surprise for you." She giggled. You seem a bit suspicious of the stone, but there would be no way that Oshawott would hurt you in any way.

"Welp, here goes nothing!" You lift the stone up like a drink, and put it on your lips. Almost instantly, the stone disappears from thin air, and Oshawott looks very gleeful. "So, what was the surprise?" You ask.

She giggles a bunch. " So, I've been looking at your search history, and, low and behold, I see that you are a big macrophiliac. So, the crystal that you used will shrink you to whatever size you desired."

At first, you thought she was kidding, although, she was correct about the search history. Before you are able to say anything else, you feel a sudden shift in feeling, as the world around you starts to rapidly grow.

You also feel a shift in weight, as Oshawott gets a bit closer to you, she also starting to grow as well. "What size do you desire, master?"

"Well, to be frank, I really wish to be...
115211.title: Oshowatt

1152121.content:
I woke up with a fuzzy feeling in my head and a sore body. The last thing I remembered was falling asleep next to my female Pokemon partner, Dewott. Like always, I had been dreaming about being shrunk to an inch tall and at the mercy of a female Pokemon. This time, my mistress was a Gardevior who was especially playful with her mouth. My entire dream was centered around her torturing me with her tongue and ended with her swallowing my small form. But this dream wasn't a bad one for me, in fact I loved it. I've always had a shrinking fetish and loved the idea of being kept by a giant female Pokemon of any kind. The only thing I didn't like about my dreams was that the Pokemon never seemed to care about me and only kept me as a personal toy, and the fact that they never used their feet on me, I really love feet.

I didn't realize that Dewott had special plans for me when I had fallen asleep. I was totally confused in my groggy state, it felt like I was drunk. When I looked around and saw that everything was huge, I thought I was hallucinating. It wasn't until the groggy feeling left me when I realized I had been shrunk. I didn't have time to marvel at the giant world around me, because a large black hand gripped me instantly. I was lifted into the air in a sickening rush and I felt like I was gonna throw up. Eventually, my vision was filled with the sight of Dewott, except she was like a hundred times bigger. "How are you feeling?" She asked concerned. I completely missed the fact that she was speaking english and answered, "Uh fine." She sighed, relieved because she thought I had been harmed in some way. She was always so protective of me. "Um... what happened to me?" I asked stupidly.

Dewott smiled, "I made your dreams come true." She said happily. "What makes you think this is my dream?" I asked, trying to act oblivious. "Oh don't try to act dumb, I know you have a shrinking fetish. I've you seen you looking at your Xtransiever scrolling through stories about giant female Pokemon who torture their shrunken trainers with their feet, butt, mouth, for some: boobs, and even um... "making love"." She finished awkwardly, she was always shy about that topic. "Well because you were so interested in the stories, I thought I would help you make your own." She says in a mock flirty tone. I smiled the biggest smile I have ever smiled in my life. I couldn't believe Dewott could somehow shrink me and did it just to make me happy. She was way too good to me!

Dewott's face took on a serious look for a moment. "While I'm doing this, I refuse to be cruel to you. I will be playing with you plenty, but I would never dream of hurting you. If I ever do start hurting you, please tell me." She finished. Her playful look from earlier returned to her face. "Now, since I'm doing this for you I'll let you decide what I do to you first. But after that, I do what I want. So what do you wanna do?" She asks playfully. "Do you want me to grind you between my feet? Shove you up my butt and make you lick? Do you wanna play around in my mouth with my tongue? I'll even do... that thing if you really want me to." She added shyly. What do you want Dewott to do to you first?
1152121.title: Let the fun begin!

choices: Go inside her mouth! It's a once in a lifetime experience
Stay out of her mouth! It's too dangerous!
11521212.content:
Fighting in vain to control my blushing, I stammer that I would like to go inside her mouth. The Dewott smiles, licking her lips as she nods.

"Alright then," she says. "But... I guess I should tell you, I've obviously never done this before. So... I'll try my best to not swallow you, but if I start to go overboard with all this... Try to tell me, and I'll spit you out. Okay?"

Keeping a tight grip on my body, my Dewott moves me towards her mouth, slowly parting her jaws. I gaze into the fleshy interior of her mouth, plenty big enough to fit me inside. I also glance at the white fangs lining it... And suddenly start to feel worried. What if she does go overboard? What if she swallows me? If I'm dead, I can't enjoy this experience at all.

I suddenly shout for my Dewott to stop, and she pauses. Her mouth closes, and she raises me up to her eyes again as she stares at me in confusion.

"What's wrong?" she asks.

"I... Uh... I'm not so sure about this anymore," I stammer. "You're sure you won't eat me?"

Your Dewott smiles gently, and quickly moves me towards her mouth. Her tongue slips from between her lips and gives my face a long, slimy lick. I cough and splutter, looking into her huge eyes in fear that this action means she will indeed eat me. However, on the contrary, she states the opposite.

"Listen, I'm not gonna eat you. Trust me, you don't even taste good."

"Wow. Thanks."

"Hey, it means you won't die from this," my Dewott says, smiling widely. I can't help but feel nervous from the fangs that show when she smiles. "So, ready to go inside my mouth now?"

It would be risky, but it would also be a very interesting and unique experience. What to do?
11521212.title: Sure about the mouth?

1152331.content:
You are a fisherman. You always have been your entire life, same with your father and his father after that. Unlike your family before you, who mainly stuck to land and fished Magikarp and the occasional Feebas, you like to go into the far sea to get your catch with you ever trustful partner Lapras.

You and your Lapras go back when you were just a child, learning the ropes of fishing. Your dad had won it at a fishing competition, and wanted you to have her. At first, you were scared of her, since of how big and intimidating she was, but over the years, you learned that she was kind and protective like a mother. Soon, you two were inseparable, going out and catching fish on the wild blue yonder, bonding with each new day.

Today was just like any other day, you woke up, had some breakfast, said good morning to Lapras and fed her, and went to grab some fishing supplies. After grabbing your supplies, you go to Lapras, who already finished her food, as you give her a rub on the head and smile.

"I tell yah, with how much we've been catching lately, we could be on the right track to catching a Kyogre." You chuckle, boarding your supplies onto Lapras' back. You do some last second checks, making sure Lapras isn't injured anywhere, when you notice something weird poking out of Lapras' mouth. "Hm? What'cha got there Lapras?" You ask, as she places the object onto your hands.

You look at the object quizzically. It's some sort of thin needle with a purple hue on it. As you go to pocket it, you accidentally prick yourself with it. Ouch! You thought, Hopefully this thing is isn't poisonous.

You shrug it off and proceed to hop onto Lapras's back, but all you jump on is the wooded dock, which seems to be extended. In fact, you notice that you're not even close to the edge of the dock anymore. You look up to see Lapras looking down at you, but she is huge, almost the size of a cruise ship, or maybe it's that you have shrunk.

"Huh, so that's what it does." Lapras says in a soft, mellow, female voice. It's like if buttercream became an accent.

"L-Lapras? What happened to me, and how are you able to talk?" You stammer, a bit flustered. You don't want to admit it, but ever since you've gotten used to being around Lapras, you always liked the feeling of being around something bigger.

"I shrunk you, but don't worry about it. I know a way to undo it. She says in a reassuring way, leveling her head down to your body. "I thought you'd maybe like it, being small for a day. Are you okay with that, or do you want me to change you back?"

You think on it for a second. While being small may be dangerous, what with the possibility of a Magikarp of snatching you up, you know that Lapras would keep you safe. Besides, you kinda like being small. "I'm okay with it, as long as your able to change me back, like you said."

She smiles "Okay, I'd better put you on board" She says, as she leans behind you and grabs the back of your shirt with her mouth. You are lifted off the ground, as you feel the warmth of Lapras's breath hit your back in waves. Looking down, you see that you are pretty high up, as Lapras...

1153121.content:
*Yawn*

You wake up to your alarm ringing, and a gentle pounce on your bed. You open your eyes to see Chikorita, one of your best friends in the world. You remember the first time you two met, it was a cold, rainy night, and you saw something outside your window. Low and behold, a lone Chikorita, cold and practically starving was at your doorstep. You took her in, and you've been best buddies ever since.

"Good morning Chikorita" You say with a smile, getting out of your bed, picking up Chikorita with. "I bet your hungry, aren't you?"

"Chika" Chikorita replied enthusiastically. You decide to make pancakes while Chikorita goes outside to play. After about 20 minutes, you go outside to call for your little buddy.

"Chikorita, breakfast is ready!" You exclaimed. You hear rustling from a bush nearby, as Chikorita pops out of it, sporting some weird necklace around her neck. You bend down towards Chikorita to take a closer look .

"What's this?" You ask, holding up the purple gem on the necklace. You see Chikorita light up when you ask that question, and began to hold it as well, but this time, the stone started to glow, and the world around you started to get a bit hazy.

You soon feel a jolt of energy hit you, as you snap out of your dazed set of mind. "Woah, that was pretty weird. How did you do that Chikorita?" You ask her. She seems to look at you like she's expecting something.

"Uhh, is there something wrong?" You ask, but soon, you start to notice that she is getting bigger, or maybe... you are getting smaller. You start to look around, seeing everything slowly get bigger and bigger, even Chikorita, to where you are almost her height by now.

"W-what is happening!?" You exclaim.

"You're shrinking. Isn't this what you always wanted?" You hear a reply to your question from non other than Chikorita.

"Chikorita!? How are you able to talk?" You ask, as you are almost a foot tall and still shrinking.

"The stone allows us to communicate to each other. Isn't it great!" She replied, being the bubbly self she has always been, even when you are shrinking.

"But why am I shrinking!?" You are about 6 inches now, and about a quarter of how tall Chikorita is.

"I know what you are into, trainer. You always wanted to be smaller than me, so I found this necklace that allows you to fulfill that deep desire of yours." She said with a smile. You start to blush and look away, feeling a bit flustered knowing that your Pokemon knows about your secrets.

"H-how much am I going to shrink?" You ask, noticing that your shrinkage is slowing down.

"I'd say about at one inch. So, what do you want to do, short stuff." She says teasingly, poking your little form with her leaf. You look up at Chikorita's looming body and think.

" Well, maybe we could... "
1153121.title: Chikorita

11531212.content:
"I was thinking, maybe, we could get a bit..... well, intimate, with each other." You say, your face hot like the burning sun.

"Aww, you get so cute when your flustered." Chikorita replied with a full grin, looking down on your tiny body. "Why not we take it a little slow before we get to that part trainer, you don't want to spoil the fun too quickly." She chuckles a little .

"Well, what is your proposal for a thing to do?" You ask, still a bit overwhelmed by the size of your friend. By now, your shrinking had fully stopped, and the bristles on your carpet to up to your knees.

"Well, I have an idea of what we could do together." She says, as she picks you up with the leaf of hers. You hear her shuffle around a bit before her leaf moves again, putting you on a squishy, smooth, green surface. You have a tough time trying to keep your balance on the uneven ground and end up falling to your hand and knees. You hear Chikorita giggle, and the area around you began to jiggle a lot. You soon come to realize that you are on Chikorita's belly.

"Mmm, you feel so good on there." You hear her say, as some Chikorita stretches, sending vibrations all over her body. You decide to start to try and stand up, which is a very difficult task, since of how wobbly the "floor" is, and the fact that every time to put a lot of pressure somewhere, Chikorita starts to giggle again, making the task even harder.

"Hey, uh, trainer?" After a few minutes of trying to get up, you hear Chikorita ask you something.

"Yes Chikorita?" You reply.

"If it isn't too bothersome for you, can you.... rub my belly for me?" She asks, being very shy about it.

Now who is the flustered one? You think to yourself. "I GUESS I'll do it." You say in a very fake sarcastic tone. You start to use your arms and legs to shuffle across the large landscape, occasionally stopping to rub intensely at certain places, as you hear Chikorita hum in pleasure.

After a good few minutes, you lay down from exhaustion, as you feel Chikorita start to move.

"You did a good job there, trainer." She says, picking you back up with her leaf, and putting you back on the ground. "Now it's your turn to choose what we should do." She says, flipping herself to where she's laying down on her belly, full playful grin on her face again.

What happened to all that shyness before? "Well, I do have an idea, but I'm not sure you would like it." You imply, also having a grin on your face.

"What is it, that you'd like to do?" She says, a little inkling of worriedness in her words.

"I'd like to be smothered by..."
11531212.title: "Fun" with Chikorita

115312121.content:
"I guess, your butt." You say, feeling your heart quicken a little.

"Oh... Oh." Chikorita replied, a bit tongue tied, "You want me to..... sit on you?" She starts to blush a lot, maybe from embarrassment, maybe from the thought of her sitting on you.

"I guess, it you really want too." It seems that you were both in a very submissive stalemate. Her, knowing you are her trainer, and you, being much smaller than her.

"A-alright, I'll do it." She says very quickly, turning around at almost the same speed as she did speak, showing you her gigantic butt. "Just tell me if I press to hard, or something, okay."

"Okay, I guess I'm ready." You confirm, laying your body on the ground, looking right at the ceiling.

"Alright, I-I'm sitting down." She tells you, having a little crack in her voice as her booty starts to descend onto your position, if not slowly. The butt fills your line of vision, and presses right onto you.

If you had to describe it, it would feel very plush, and soft, almost like a pillow. You start to press your arms on the butt, messaging it in a way. You hear an audible gasp coming from Chikorita, and then soft humming.

"Oh, why does this feel so.... good?" You hear Chikorita exclaim, as the humming gets a bit louder, almost like a moan or something. You begin to feel a lot more pressure than you did at the beginning, as Chikorita seemed to grind her butt a little on your figure.

You feel the pressure come off you, as you lie on the ground, a bit out of breath. You look up to see the other cheek of Chikorita's butt coming right at you, faster than the first one.

Thoooooom. You don't feel crushed, since the butt is very soft, but it feels really uncomfortable, as Chikorita started to rub more intensely on you, her moans getting louder and louder.

She soon start to lift her butt a little and bring it right back down, and rub a little where you might be. She might have gotten a bit overboard. You think, as your body gets berated by her sitting down on you over and over again, lifting your arms up a bit to elevate the pressure.

Soon, you see her giant tailhole come over to you, and your hand goes in it for a bit, which creates a powerful gasp from Chikorita, and she instantly lifts her butt all the way up. It seems that broke her from her concentration, and made her remember that you were under her.

"I'm so sorry, really. I didn't mean to go off like that." She rambled, turning around to face you, as you stand up.

"It's okay." You assure her, "I'm just a bit bruised. Besides, it was my fault for you to sit on me, I did choose it after all."

"Oh...." She blushed, lying down in front of you and hiding her face in her arms. The atmosphere was so thick between you two, that it could be cut with a butter knife. "Do you want to.... call it a day?" She asks, a bit muffled from her still hiding her face.

You replied with...
