1153211.content:
You came home and sighed. Another long day of work you thought, you had grocery bags in hand as you opened the door carefully and nudged it shut with your foot, making for the kitchen with your bags.

"Pichu? Yo, i'm home!" You called out, and soon enough she approached, the familiar small yellow mouse, with her slight frazzled tuff on the top of her head that set her apart from other Pichu.

You'd had her for years, since you were in middle school honestly, and all these years later she still hadn't evolved. At first you thought it was because she wasn't happy with you, a sure sign of abuse with her type is if they haven't evolved after this long, but she assured you it was because she wanted to stay a Pichu.

If anything the two of you were thick as thieves. Neither of you particularly had the ambition for battles or pageantry you'd found, and more or less settled down as casual friends or partners. Though she still called you master, and still had the spark in her to shock you once or twice when you got into arguments...which usually ended up with both of you hurt and you consoling her or trying to make it up to her.

She for her part always tried to make you feel better after a long day...like today.

"How was work master?" She asked as she looked up at you, sorting the bags of groceries and pulling out an oran berry, her favorite and giving it to her.

"Same as usual..." You mumbled in your tired voice, and you got ready to settle in.

"Well...it's a long weekend for you now, right?" She asked as she chewed on her berry and you nodded, the bags under your eyes notable to her.

"Don't worry master, it's gonna be great, just you and me! And...I have a surprise for you." She said in a giddy tone, one that belied some sort of mischief, though still carrying the warmth you knew from her.

Which meant imminent disaster to you. Pichu tried stuff like this from time to time and it usually ended in disaster you thought...there was the time she tried to hire a performing Mr. Mime and that didn't end well at all.

You smiled at her though.

"I'm...sure it'll totally catch me off guard." You said, opening the fridge and putting the perishables inside. When you shut it you found that Pichu was gone.

You rubbed your head perplexed until you heard her call.

"Master! Come here~ I've got your surprise~" She said and you rounded the corner into your living room to find...Pichu holding a drink out for you. It didn't have any label or markings on it and you looked at it confused.

"Uh...a drink?" You said and she nodded.

"Try it! I promise it'll make you REEAAAAL happy!" She said and you just looked at her for a few seconds before shrugging and walking towards her, kneeling down to grab the drink from her.

You looked at it in your hand, it was a can, so you couldn't see the contents. Was it a soda? Juice? Water...?...some kind of prank?

"Come on...drink it." Pichu urged and you looked in her eyes. They held a spark of excitement and you cracked a smile.

"Alright Pichu...i'll try whatever this is, okay." You said before you raised the drink to your lips.

...it didn't taste bad actually. Kinda sweet, but a different kind of sweet than you'd ever tried. You gulped the whole thing down and let out a sigh as you finished. Pichu had a wide smile on her face.

"Good job master! Now the surprise part!" She said and you gave her a confused look.

"What do you mean? I thought the drink was the surprise?" It was then that you felt a little odd...and were your clothes baggy?

You stood up and went to take a step but you stepped right out of your shoes.

"...huh?" You said as you looked at them...then your shirt felt really baggy and your pants fell down, your belt unable to hold them up anymore...the room...Pichu...they seemed to be getting bigger.

"Uh...Pichu...that drink..." You said nervously and she nodded up to you...now as large as a Raichu to you.

"I know about what you like master...I saw it on your computer...and I looked up this drink..." She said smiling. "And it shrinks whoever drinks it! Surprise!" She said.

For your part your clothes no longer fit you at all as you were child sized, you threw the tarp that was your shirt off and noticed you were completely nude now. With a blush you covered your privates with your hand and noticed that Pichu was as tall as your waist now.

"Pichu! T-this is a little extreme, isn't it!?" You said and she giggled.

"Relax master, this isn't permanent...just a way for you to enjoy your weekend with me...don't worry, I won't let anything happen to you, so try and have fun!" She said as the shrinking was picking up and soon you were eye level with her...but it didn't stop there, she was getting taller than you!

Down and down you went, you shut your eyes tight, trying to comprehend the experience...soon enough, when you opened your eyes you were...
1153211.title: Shrinking with Pichu

choices: Pichu stared at you seductively. Not so innocent, was she?
11532112.content:
Initially, your eyes opened just slightly as you took an experimental glance in front of you, if only to judge how small you truly were now that the shrinking seemed to have gotten to an end.

But your eyes shot wide open and your mouth hung as you noted that you were barely as tall as one of your Pichu's toes!

"P... Pichu?" you stuttered.

The yellow goddess in front of you erupted in a fit of high-pitched giggles that didn't quite match your squeaky voice.

"You should see yourself, master!" she boomed from above as she stared down at you, a teeny tiny insect standing in a pile of gigantic clothes by her feet,
"You're so tiny... and cute!"

"Pichu, just what did you give me!?" you shouted, still trying to process what was going on.

Okay, you did dream of this a few times, but living it was a truly different story. It was frightening to see things from the point of view of a bug, though you couldn't deny it was... vaguely exciting.

Years of dreams coming true so suddenly left you surprised, but still...

"Aw, my little master is being pouty," Pichu cooed as she reached down, her short, stubby paw extending as she bent to grab a hold of you; you suddenly found yourself in the grip of the goddess as she brought you up.

Then, forward went your world as you were shoved forcefully against a fuzzy wall - the chest of your formerly small companion.

An embrace.

"There's no need to worry, master," she spoke lovingly, not breaking her embrace, which soon grew to be soothing for you,
"As I already mentioned, this isn't permanent, though I don't doubt you'd love that... and me too~" she teased.

You closed your eyes for a moment and inhaled deeply.

"It isn't permanent? You sure?"

Pichu nodded her head.

"Just for the weekend?"

"Just for the weekend."

You thought for a moment more, before making your ultimate decision.

"Okay. I'm in." you said, leaning your head against the wall of yellow fur that was in front of you, letting the feeble electricity it produced tickle the hairs on your limbs.

Pichu giggled.

"Glad to hear that, master," she said, delighted by the news; just as if you were a doll, she began throwing you back and forth in her grip, causing you to feel nauseous.

One last big jump on the couch and Pichu settled back down onto the leather before laying still and freeing you from her grip, leaving you laying on her tummy.

The big eared giantess raised her cute face to see you, her insect-sized trained lost in a sea of ankle-deep yellow fur.

"You look sooo cute, master! I wonder why I haven't done this a long ago!" she exclaimed cheerfully.

"Probably because you knew nothing about-" you trailed off and your cheeks flared up.

There was no need for you to mention that. Okay, Pichu knew about it, but it was still kind of embarrassing for you.

How smart of a mouse was she to discover your secret without you not even knowing? A true sneaky devil.

Seeing your blush only made the yellow behemoth giggle harder.

One of her paws soon found its way back to you and it snuck up behind your back; five tiny fingers pushed against your back and shoved you belly-down onto your pokemon's own stomach as she pulled you in another embrace.

You didn't fight it and, for several minutes, nothing was said or done.

You were still trying to convince yourself this wasn't some kind of very lucid dream; Pichu, on the other hand, was coming up with ways to start the fun for you... and for her as well.

Because this was undoubtedly, undeniably going to be the greatest experience ever.

After a while, the mouse shot you a sly grin.

"Hey master," she called in a sugary voice,
"Don't ya think it's time to do something?"

"Yeah, sure," you agreed,
"What do you have in mi-" you trailed off; upon rising your head from the land of yellow and looking up at Pichu, you got a chance to glance at her face.
11532112.title: Of mice and bugs

11532113.content:
You stared up at Pichu smiling down at you, as you just got smaller and smaller. First going past her waist, then her knees and eventually being even too small to see the top of her feet.

Aww, Master! You are so adorable!

You stare up at her in amazement, as...

Today was a rather lazy, boring day. You just had your Pikachu out of her pokeball and lying down with you on your bed. She was the one pokemon that you trusted with just about anything. You just smiled at her, as she stared lovingly at you.

You didn't really feel anything from that, until you realized that Pikachu, who was on top of you at that point, seemed to be getting heavier. Looking around at your surroundings, you see that everything around you was slowly growing bigger. You couldn't believe your eyes. "P...Pikachu...!"

When you stop shrinking, you end up...

As she got off, you stood up on your bed to notice that you had shrunk to her chin, and you were still going! You start to panic a little as you're not even half her size and you're still shrinking down! You cower a little, not really knowing how small you'll get. When you finally feel like you've stopped shrinking, you start to look around at your new environment. You then look up a little at your Pikachu, who is now a giant compared to you. She's now a little more than five times your size, and your height only reached to about her knees. You know that she wouldn't do anything bad towards you, although it still worried you that she was just so large.

Still smiling, she looked down at you and started to say something, "Well? I told you it would make today more exciting!"

You continue to stare up at her. At least you were lucky enough to be shrunk by her, as opposed to anyone else. She only loved you a lot...

"Well then," she continued, "I wonder what we can do now..."

choices: What if I beat you in a game? Best 2/3?

1153212212.content:
Vicky and you shared a fairly good relationship. You brought home the bacon. You worked, payed for the mortgage, brought home food and got utilities payed off.

Vicky made things. The tv you both watched, the oven, dishwasher, fridge. She loved to make electronics. Atop that, she was able to power the entire house herself.

That might be why while your living arrangement seemed weird to others, it really worked out.

This weirdness was more so over the fact that while you were human, she was not.

You stood 5"8' with dark brown, shorter hair. Lightly tanned skin, and a decent build. Well toned and healthy.

Vicky, however, was a Pokémon. An anthro Raichu, to be precise. She stood a few inches shorter than you, just 5"0' even, with dark chocolate hair pulled back in a thin ponytail. She didn't normally wear clothing, though her fur kept herself decent enough. She was a bit chubby, with a decent belly, thick thighs and an ass to match. Her breasts were fairly sized, at mid-C cups, but she was more bottom heavy than anything.

While you enjoyed a fair bit of things, ranging from light sports such as tennis and basketball, to simple gaming and fantasy shows, Vicky was into more geeky things.

Aside from her love for tinkering and electronics, she had a love for all fantasy kinda events. D&D, gaming, LARP fighting, you name it.

But her major hit, was miniature landscaping. She loved to create tiny, fully functional, realistic landscapes. A countryside farm with a house and barn. A huge city with working cars, busses and trains. Even a huge amusement park section, all scaled down to size, and all functional, thanks to her own ability generate electricity.

The two of you had a good life, and while you both had some different interests, you loved to watch tv or a movie together, play a game or two, or just chat.

But! This month, you got... Lucky? Kind of. You were laid off for a month, a whole month without work! But a whole month without that extra money. It would be tight, sure you could pay off all bills, and have money for food and gas, but nothing fun this month. No new games, or going out to eat.

You woke up in a bit of a daze that Monday, and got out of bed tiredly, heading to the kitchen to make breakfast.

Vicky was nowhere to be seen, either still asleep or in her shed. It didn't matter, you were too tired. Making a simple breakfast of cereal and coffee, you leaned against the counter and watched the morning news from the kitchen doorway.

A minute after the coffee finished, sure enough, Vicky came in through the back door in the kitchen, immediately washing dirty, oily paws in the sink.

You looked to her as you ate, a small smirk rising. "Another toy?" You ask, figuring she had been tinkering again.

As the mouse turned around, you saw a huge grin on her face, eyes wide and bright. "Soon enough it will make me another!" She said, giggling. "I've been working on this thing for months now!" She took a second cup of coffee from the pot and downed it black, shivering afterward. "Ahh~ But! I am gonna need you to test it for me later, if that's okay."

You frowned, a little apprehensive. "Am I really going to want to? I don't even know what it is, and something tells me you won't tell me what it is, unless it works." You said, shifting back.

Her eyes widened a bit more, her smile was a bit unnerving. "Well, what if I..."
1153212212.title: Unlikely Pair

"Argh! Raichu!" you yell.

This day had begun well, with a trip to the park with your pokemon, Raichu. You had found your place at the feet of a large tree, you laid down and you eventually began snoozing while your pokemon played.

But you were then rudely awoken by a 'playful' shock hitting you.

"Discharge!"

One would barely believe such thing was caused by such little, adorable creature.

Said little fluff ball had a slim figure, a white and blue body with short, stubby limbs and petite paws; it had coal black eyes, yellow round cheeks and a large, fluffy tail which currently swung back and forth in excitement.

Pachirisu liked being praised, and she deserved all of it: over the past week, thanks to a lot of effort and her optimistic attitude, she had improved massively.

"Did I do good?" she asked, turning around, eager to receive more compliments.

"That was amazing. Really amazing." you replied, approaching your pokemon. It was curious how a creature that didn't even reach your knee could unleash such power but you had learned long ago that Pachirisu was normal pokemon.

You met her a long time ago in this same forest near your house; back then, she had been wounded, maybe by some larger pokemon, and her cries managed to get your attention as well as inspire your pity, which led you to bring her home and nurse her back to health.

You've been very close since then, but it soon became clear that Pachirisu was no ordinary one; whatever pokemon hurt her had a huge luck on their side, because Pachirisu had a huge potential.

You wondered if she was just messing with you, but that expression of hers carried something in it that made you want to believe you, almost like a threat hidden behind her elongated tooth and cute face.

"That question has a lot of answers, and you will hate all of them." Your Zorua, Aki, responded, looking down at your feet right in front of her rather than at you, which was a strange thing to be doing.

"Seriously, where did you get it?"
"You know that weird old couple on the mountain?"
"Did you get it from them?"
"No."

You find yourself at a loss of words. For several days, Aki had been bringing home increasingly shady charms and berries and the like, making vague and sinister comments, and generally giving you looks that had this look that screamed "This is gonna be fun", though none of them ever did anything. She just kind of...did things...without telling anyone, least of all you, like walking off into weird parts of the forest, using your computer for no reason you could discern, and using your money to buy chintzy good luck charms and dreamcatchers with intended effects that were poorly described but just made the house smell like dust. There was also that visit to the Move Tutor she did on her own, after which he would lock his doors and look nervously out the windows when you passed by with Aki. But always, she tried to push you through it ahead of her.

"So why even bring them up then?" You continue, in at this point ritual protest against Aki's campaign of occult impulses.

"They told me not to take it from one of the old shrine rooms, warning of its immense power and blah blah. I don't even think it belonged there, I think some magician left it there accidentally. Not important." She runs through the sentence at a blistering pace, leaving you in the dust as to most of what she said.

"Did you steal it from the shrine, Aki?" You ask. "I know nobody uses it for anything, but it's like a monument, I think."

"Augh, just try it already!" Aki moans, headbutting your waist. She's larger than most Zoruas, being 3 whole feet tall. Most people who saw her were surprised by it, but you'd gotten used to it. You turn the weird seashell-shaped object over in your hand. It looked like a brooch, sort of.

"Uh...how?"
Aki looks up at you for a brief moment and ducks her shoulders in what you guess very quickly is a shrug. She looks back down the next second, though. You decide to go along with it.

You press the object against the top of a fist with a thumb, and uncertain, you say "Okay, charm, if you do anything, D-do your stuff."

For a moment, nothing happens. Then, a booming voice thunders from the charm.

"Pick a number, One through Ten."

Aki looks up again, sparkles in her eyes. She is grinning. You shift your head, as if trying to find a better angle to look at the strange charm.
"Go on, pick a number, dude." (Aki was horribly informal with you for no reason you could figure out.)

"Uhh," You squint at the charm for a moment. "Nine?"

"Okay. 1...2...3...Go!" The charm bellows, then explodes out of your hand into pieces all over the place, leaving a cloud of dust in the air around you.

"What the heck, Aki?" You sputter, waving your hands through the air and coughing, trying to get all the dust out of your face. You couldn't see anything. "Why do you bring these things home!? Is that all it does?"

"Nope!" Aki's voice pierces your cloud, and you blink twice to get the dust out of your eyes. You find yourself face to face with your Zorua, but she's much bigger, however. She has an innocent smile on her face.
"It also does..."

"It was about time one of these things worked!" Aki was parading around the room, each step slowly shaking your ground a little more and more. At this point, it wasn't too severe, but you sense it would be soon enough. You glance in the direction of your Zorua. She was pacing in a strange way, where each set of legs on a given side of her body were moving in different directions, but were also in the air at the same time. It's almost like she was skipping without the fast jumping part of the skip. The motion strikes you as probably taking a lot of practice.
"Aki, please explain what you've been doing with my money." You have closed your eyes, not yet ready to address the elephant in the room, that being your shrinking.

"Alright, you should sit down. This is a long story. You ready?" She says, voice difficult to hear because she was continuously walking away and not facing you.
"Please face me when you're talking. And stop walking. It's getting... loud."
"So you watch a lot of porn, bro. Like, a lot. Like, an absurd -"
"Please move on."
"Okay. So I do as well, and -"
"Is this a necessary part of the story?" You ask, opening your eyes to look at the ceiling. It wasn't as far away as you had been taught by fiction to expect it to be. It actually looked the same distance away, plus a few feet. That's what your surroundings looked like, like the point of view one might have if you just had your head pressed against the floor.
"It. Is completely necessary." Aki licks her lips in a very I'm-not-hungry-I'm-just-licking-my-lips-for-body-language sort of way. For a moment, you lose focus and think about how cute she looks from across the room. She continues with the "story".
"I noticed a trend from our histories, the other weekend, you know? And it was -" You held up a hand, and made a gesture with both your arms. It was "wrap it up", because you didn't like hearing the name of your fetish out loud. You were a dignity-first person, and this situation was quickly removing every aspect of yours.

"Oh, okay. Because I'm a microphile and you're a macrophile (She said it!), I've been buying every cult-y charm and talisman on the market for fantasy fulfillers. But..."
"They're all ripoffs?" You ask.
"Yes! Exactly! So I cut out the whooole "fantasy" middleman and stole a charm which claims to shrink folks from the mountain. And it worked! Hooray!"

At the "hooray", Aki hops in the air, quite close to you now, her body now three times your height already. You watched the short leap, putting your hand against your head, which was a mistake. You should've been putting your hands on the ground. The tail hits first, and a wave of dust, like a dry ocean wave, blows you off your feet and back into a sitting position. You were quite skinny and tall without a lot of padding, so it hurt more than it probably should've. Then, the rest of Aki came down. Her front left paw hits first, crashing awkwardly on the ground with a shabby crash. Her face twisted into a frown of awkward surprise. It was at this moment that you and Aki share a thought.

Each leg following the first lands in painful-looking positions, you though you didn't see all of them, because she is on top of you in an instant. You were buried in the huge amounts of fur at her breast as Aki fell whole and whole on top of you. The fluffy press is like losing a wrestling match to a woolly mammoth. You attempt to sass Aki, but get a mouthful of weirdly thick hairs, which you surmise is because you're at this point probably a sixth of your height. Instead, you decide to kick and punch as hard as you can, and yell angrily. This needless to say gets the message across very quickly to Aki, who gets up very quickly. She frantically stands at attention, as is traditional when she feels she's made a terrible mistake, then breaks her militaristic stance in favor of a more informal slouch, head looking down at you lying straight down on your back, sprawled out and tired.

“Soldier…" You start. “Curb your excitement, for ONE moment.” You spoke at a volume like you were speaking to your whole team.
"I'm super sorry, master! I -! " She starts to panic, but you stop her.
"Let me finish."
"Erp-!" She sucks in her lips, like she just tasted something sour.
"I...approve of this financial venture."
"I'm so sorry...!" She repeats, then does a double take. "Uhh, did I hear that wrong?" She asks, still uncertain and frazzled.

"I'm glad you decided to do this. For the both of us, I mean. And, as long as you don't use my shrinking as an excuse for mutiny, and promise to return all the other, useless occult garbage you've bought, I will authorize you, and by extension me...

...to have as much fun as possible."

Aki's eyes lit up. It was always nice when you showed your heart from underneath your all-business exterior, but this was easily the highlight of her day, and you could tell. She looked like she could cry tears of joy.

"Come here, let me give you a hug." You say, getting up back onto your feet. Aki slides in, blushing slightly at how your body now doesn't quite reach her rather...imperial...midsection. You hug just one of her front legs, barely able to wrap your arms around it. She grins like a madwoman, and, when the hug ends after what seems like a beautiful hour, she backs off.

"So," you ask, "I picked a "nine". How much shrinking is a nine, anyway?" You ask. You had just hit the four inch mark, and were beginning to wonder when exactly you would hit your final size, so to speak.

"I have no idea, ha!" Aki had fully recovered to her informal and almost rogue-ish self. "The silly old couple who wanted me not to take it didn't know a lick about it, either. But, while we wait for you to sloooooowly dwindle to whatever size you end up at, do you wanna...
1153321211.title: Gradual...

choices: "Well, what if we used this intimate spot for something more intimate?"
11533212111.content:
"Let's go hang out on the couch." Aki seems to bounce, raring to go and play. You knew her, though, and she would tucker out of this the second she hit furniture.
"Alright," you say. "We can go sit around for a while and wait out this shrinking if you want. But I'm in no condition to easily get up on such a monument.

The aforementioned and legendary couch stood in a corner of the room which was deliberately designed to look like it was never used, yet in reality was used all the time, though, it should be stated, not by more than one occupant at a time. It was an area of which to be ashamed among you and your comrades (which is to say, your Pokemon.), and it was, despite being public, an incredibly private spot, and one which nobody was expected to linger on for too long. There was a sitting area out in the open, of course, but the lonely couch in the corner was a cornerstone (no pun intended) which represented some comfortable weakness. Sitting there in that corner alone with your thoughts was like a calming sleep, even if you were only there for a few moments. It was more private than a bed, most likely. Being asked to sit there with someone else was getting away with murder, really. The couch was, undeniably, legendary . It held some mystical sort of power beyond what a normal over-quilted brown leather couch should possess. And here you and Aki were going to share it. The same thought space, the same private, me-time space. It was totally romantic.

...At least, that's what Aki tells you, gently boosting you up to a cushion with her nose, before hopping up on it herself. She flops sideways, exposing her underbelly in a surrounding of you. It wasn't by much, yet, but you were still shrinking, since the hugeness of the long haired torso definitely seemed larger now than it had when it was haphazardly upon you. Aki's legs pull in around you, nudging you and holding you against the big girl. You slump back against Aki as she stretches lazily. You strike up the conversation.

"Hey, why'd you want to do it in the first place?" You couldn't see it, but you could tell from the way the torso changed rhythms in rising and falling that the question surprised Aki.
"What d'ya mean?"
"Well, I would never have thought to do this sort of thing, and I wouldn't have ever thought someone else would. Why go through with it?"
"Huh? Well, I guess I just wanted to actually experience having you as my little buddy for a while. We don't really get a lot of vacation time, you know? So, I thought, why not make work a little more interesting? Spice things up at home base, eh?"
"No, I meant, why go through the trouble day after day of bringing home something to make ME happy, and keep trying to find some "wish fulfillment" charm for me?"
"We're compatible?"

"That's not what I meant, missy." You bumped your head lightly against the expanding downy coat. "If, in theory, you finally brought home something that would grant any wish you wanted, why give it to me? You could just use it yourself and shrink me all on your own. There was never any need to pass things through me like you did."
Some heat seemed to pour behind you. You didn't need any kind of sign to tell that Aki was blushing. Her legs obscured most of your view of the room, and hid her face from you for the time being, but you could tell.
"Erp! W-well, see... I wanted it to be... special?"

"It would've been special either way, Aki. It's both of our fantasies. What's the real reason?" Her breathing was getting slightly faster. It struck you as cute.
"Uhhhhh, could you r-repeat that? I c-couldn't hear you! Your voice is so very small, oh no!" She faked, unconvincingly.
"You heard me both times. Why did you want me to shrink myself? I mean, it clearly wasn't your intent to trick me into it until just today, when you skipped the hoopla and just brought home a shrinker. You said it yourself. Why?"
A sigh breezed over you. Aki's body increased in heat.

"It's just... I didn't just want you. I wanted you to want me. I'm a bully. That's my job, that's the task I'm given on the team, that's what I'm best at, you know? I'm the go-getter." A stale but not unpleasant wind wafted past from somewhere you couldn't quite tell. You suspected it was Aki, but you didn't really know for certain.
"I wanted to be a diva for once, kind of. I didn't want to have to shrink you on my own, I wanted you to want to shrink for me. But I couldn't make that happen, no matter how much I tried. I couldn't make you teach me Minimize, because I couldn't learn it. I couldn't find a charm which would let you wish to shrink, because they're all useless rocks and necklaces with no power at all. No matter how hard I tried, I couldn't make you take the step towards this. I ended up having to trick you into it. I was pulling all the weight, even to set this up. I - I didn't want to have that happen, but I failed."

You became conscious of hitting the two inch mark. Aki was twice as big now as she was when she could smush you underneath her by tripping. You couldn't possibly get your arms around one of her enormous legs now. They were pillars of fur now. As these thoughts passed through you, you struggled to think of a reply to comfort her. You couldn't quite find anything to say. But you had learned not to accept unconditional failure. You stood up. The huge, thick fabric covering the couch gave a little as Aki turned over slightly, pushing her face into the couch. She hadn't felt you stand up, it seemed. You took advantage of this fact. Sneaking past her gaze, you snuck behind a front paw. It was large, but that wouldn't stop you. You jump clear over it, not making any contact with the fluffy pad at all. Your cover remained intact. You crept silently under Aki's black chin, and, when her breathing started to slow down again, you make your move.

Seconds thereafter, Aki felt a heartfelt and deep kiss, from seemingly nowhere in particular, light, and small, tiny even, but deeper more likely than any kiss that could ever be intended for just a Zorua, or any other battling Pokemon or pet. This was real.

She shot up, shaken, not stirred, and stared at you with deep, sharp eyes filled with the bad sort of confusion. The rapidly moving weight dissolved the solid ground, launching you onto a splayed sit, propped up barely on your back by your elbows, as you looked up at the exasperated and monolithic face.

"This...this isn't like you." She spoke, and the words seemed to shake the couch harder than her huge frame and intense body possibly could. You became aware of yourself hitting the inch and a half mark.

"A-Aki, wait. I was just trying to make you feel better."

A long silence passes. It occurs to you that for the longest time, you had been living in a broken home, and didn't even realize it. You were pressing too hard on Aki's narrative, and now there was some kind of rift here, like the two feet, ten and a half inches of height difference between you two were filled with transgressions and offenses and pain you didn't even know were there. You held your head, and felt bad.

But then you stopped doing both of those things. Here was the bright side: it used to be three feet one of all that ugliness. Even though you were still shrinking, you couldn't ever get to that level again. This was an improvement. You look confidently back up at Aki.

"Don't take it too personally, Aki. Please, sit back down."
Some life seemed to shoot back into her eyes just then. And you would get rid of the confusion in them momentarily.
"You didn't fail at all. I still accepted those things from you, day after day, even though none of them did anything. It's like you said. We both wanted this. I wanted this.

What we should be doing now isn't this. We should be enjoying each other as we are right now, like a romantic couple. I mean, you're such a big, strong girl, you know?" You smiled, just a little bit.

Aki rolled onto her back, sweeping you once again onto her stomach, on top of her. You both looked each other in the eyes. Aki was like a living landscape to you now.
"Thanks, master. That's why you're the boss, boss!" She panted a little, her head seeming to light up once more with the familiar and friendly girlishness you loved. "I'm sorry for being such a drama queen. I just wanted you to...love me, you know?"
"I do love you!" You reply somewhat eagerly. It was uncanny how her mood could pick back up so quickly. Maybe you mentioning being like a romantic couple had sparked something.
"So! You said we'd be like a romantic couple, right? Well, we've still got some time, and you still look like you're shrinking to me, so, what would a romantic pair like us be doing at a time like this?"

You struggle to think of something to solidify Aki's return to spirits. Two things immediately spring to mind, and you decide between them quickly.
11533212111.title: R & R

choices: "Why don't you... move on a different part of me with that massage?"
115332121112.content:
"How about just a massage?" you offered as you regarded the gigantic Zorua in front of you; Aki entirely occupied your sight now, and a good percentage of the sky above her.

Nonetheless, she seemed to be still able to hear you perfectly.

"Seriously dude? That's not what I had in mind..." she responded, sounding disappointed.

"Me neither," you replied, patting her immense belly, taking notice that the thick, black fur was still expanding around you.
"But it's a good start, don't you think?"

A shrug was the only response you managed to get from your now gigantic pokemon looked at your incredibly tiny form.

You were the size of an incredibly tiny bug to her, but the whole thing was turning out to be more exciting each minute that passed.

"Fine." she simply said, still using that informal yet disappointed tone. Clearly, her mind was currently filling itself with all the nice, ‘fun’ things you could be doing together in this moment.

Without adding any more words, you knelt down on the soft ground and placed both your hands on Aki's tummy before you started to rub.

You doubted she could feel your hands sliding onto the warm skin hidden beneath her dark fur, but, to your surprise, she let out a moan shortly after you began rubbing, shaking the ground beneath you.

"Aki!" you shouted, startled.

"So-Sorry, master," she apologized, looking at you; you could swear you saw the fur of her cheeks going from black to red.
"That felt really good... could ya continue that?" she asked, the disappointment faded from her voice.

You smiled, satisfied, as you stood back up and began rubbing Aki's stomach once again, backing her into a state of bliss, which she expressed with incomprehensible but definitely pleased mutterings escaping her mouth.

"So..." you chimed at some point,
"This was your... thing, huh?"

Aki perked up, smirking.

"Why? Wasn't it your ‘thing’ as well?" she snapped back, sending you in a state of deep embarrassment.

You didn't initially reply.

But then you reluctantly asked,

"So? Since when...?"

Aki let out another moan.

"A long time... heh, it was fun, y'know! Spying on you while you watched that stuff on your computer at night, believing that you were alone, while in reality I was there all the time..." she revealed.

You felt like you were on fire; your hands abruptly stopped, and your head sprang up to look at the still expanding Zorua.

"What?!"

Aki snickered.
"Yep... I can use illusions, remember?" she said, staring at you, still shrinking while onto her belly. You looked incredibly cute to her, a tiny bug massaging her stomach.

"All those nights together, fantasizing about tinies at my paws like in those websites... and when I finally figured out that you had the opposite fetish, I simply had to do something - but, please, keep those hands moving. It feels wonderful!" she chimed loudly.

Nodding, you resumed your work, but went silent for a while; Aki went silent too, save for her moans, which kept escaping her mouth.

"So..." Aki broke the silence again,
"This is want romantic couples like us do? I can see why - this is wonderful dude!" she chimed.

You smiled.

"I still can't believe where I am, doing what I'm doing." you mused, petting your pokemon softly.

"Yeah yeah, I know - it's incredible one of those charms finally worked, huh? And they say stealing is bad!" she snickered, sending vibrations throughout her whole body and making you stop once again.

You thought about scolding Aki for such comment, but you found it hard to say something different than ‘Whoa!’ when you were basically in the middle of an earthquake that made you lose your balance and fall rear-down onto the smooth fur of your gigantic pokemon.

Aki stopped laughing, but blushed heavily; her eyes closed, a smile, a sincere smile instead of her characteristic grin, appeared on her face.

"I... I'm so happy... it finally happened..." she admitted, her voice assuming a more girlish tone, the one you loved.

"Even though it's hard to believe this isn't a dream... yeah. I'm happy too, Aki." you said, laying down and enveloping what you could of your pokemon in a hug, kissing the furry surface of Aki's stomach, getting a mouthful of fur.

The enormous Zorua blushed massively at this, but shot you a look of pure bliss.

And, by doing so, she quickly became aware of something.

"Hey!" she chimed all of a sudden,
"You stopped shrinking! You're so small!" she said, with an expression that made you understand that she wanted to add ‘And so cute!’, but she kept such comment to herself.

You pulled yourself up, taking notice that you weren't shrinking anymore indeed, and that you couldn't be taller than a few centimeters.

Basically, you were the size of one of Aki's pupils.

You looked up into those blue suns that were the eyes of your pokemon and smiled.

"Yeah... it looks like I stopped..." a doubt found its way inside your head.

"Hey, Aki," you started while the giantess gently rolled to the side, letting you fall off her belly and onto the couch.

"Yeah?"

"Is there... is there any way I can grow back?" you asked, expecting the answer.

Aki snickered.

"And why would you - you! - want to grow back right now? The fun hasn't even begun, bro!" she chimed excitedly.

Her cheeriness was contagious, you discovered as you as you smiled.

"Okay, I'll give you that." you said, before taking a few steps back to fully admire your goddess, who was staring at you with a smirk glued on her face.

"So? Any ideas about what you and me should do to enjoy this situation more now?" you asked.

Aki snickered.
115332121112.title: Just some petting

choices: "We're already like this... wanna take a nap?"
"Wanna go explore outside? I bet it'll be fun with your size!"
"Didn't you want to spice things up?"
1153321211122.content:
"Y'know, you've been rubbing my belly for quite a while," Aki pointed out as she looked straight at you, who were indeed still petting her stomach,
"Why don't you move on somewhere else?"

You looked at the dark-furred goddess, spotting a familiar, mischievous glint in her moon-sized eyes.

She was obviously planning something.

But, you judged, it couldn't have been anything mischievous given her current behavior... or anything too mischievous.

"Okay," you agreed,
"Where-" you were interrupted as the world around you began shaking with great strength.

Aki was turning around.

"Aki!" you shouted as the dark-type stood on all fours, leaving you clinging upside-down to her belly-fur. From this angulation you had a pretty view of her swinging tail and, of course, her nethers. The sight made your blood travel to your head considerably faster.

The gigantic Zorua snickered again as she looked back at an indefinite spot on her stomach.

"Aki!" you shouted again.

"Chill out, dude!" came her voice, which caused her stomach to vibrate.
"You've got a soft landing, no?" she said, referring to the leather couch she was standing onto.

She did have a point.

"So, will you let go so we can keep this thing movin' already?" she said.

Her words made you close your eyes as you let go of the fur, feeling the leather under your back after a short fall.

The gleeful giantess noticed you falling beneath her.

You re-opened your eyes, catching a last glimpse of Aki's gigantic crotch before she shifted position; her hind legs shifted too as the giantess circled you, before she laid belly-down on the couch, right in front of you.

"... Don't ever do that again." you said with a time between disappointment and fear.

Aki snickered.

"Yeah, whatever, now..." her paws extended and were gently placed in front of you.
"Would you be so kind to massage my little paws as well? Thought I bet they look like two giant monsters to you, huh?" she said with a massive grin on her face.

In fact, her paws were really massive to you, two massive red carpets.

"Come on lil' master, give 'em some attention." Aki continued, pushing both her paws closer to you.
"Just like in those-"

"I got it, Aki!" you interrupted as you gently placed your hands on the red fur, becoming aware that her paws were incredibly smooth, like two giant red cushions.

"Liking it already?" Aki chimed with a smirk.

"Actually... yeah," you replied, fighting the urge to dive into the smooth red fur and lay in it, lost in the furry jungle for hours.
"Looks like I really took great care of you, huh?" you mused instead.

"Of course, master." Aki replied with a blush, again forgetting the ‘though girl’ character.

You smiled as you began rubbing the giant paw slowly, your fingertips tickling the warm skin hidden beneath tons of black/red fur.

The endless Zorua in front of you giggled at the sensation.
"Yeah... go on..." she muttered, pleased with your massage.

You smirked.

"Someone's softening." you chimed, but Aki had an even bigger smirk on her face.

"Wanna go on with the ‘dominant giantess’ thing? I think I'd be pretty good at it..." she teased.

Your mind briefly went back to the websites you used to visit at the mention, and you recalled that you were going to lick Aki's paws clean if she decided to start acting mischievously.

You hastily decided that you didn't want to go through that... not now.

"Um... no, thank you. Maybe later." you said, and Aki began laughing hysterically.

With a slight blush on your face, you began petting between her toes, tickling the giant vixen.

While you worked, you noted that there wasn't any hint of bad smell around her paws, which disappointed you a bit: the stories you read mentioned smelly and utterly disgusting paws/feet.

Not that you minded, though.

"Hey, Aki," you called as you took a step back,
"Why don't you lift your paw so I can finish up?" you said eagerly.

Aki seemed to blush.

"Hehe," she laughed nervously,
"I apologize for anything nasty you might find down there..."

The paw in front of you rose, revealing a big, circular pad in the middle of Aki's under-paw, coated in a thin layer of dust, mixed with what had to be crushed grass.

You wondered where it came from.

"Hehehe, mountain trip, y'know..." Aki admitted.

You shook your head.

"Seriously, where did you even steal that charm?" you asked as you began wiping the grass away with your hands.

"Didn't I reply to that question already?" she replied with another question, before she quieted down and observed with a joyful spark in her eyes as she watched you, a tiny ant beneath her foot, wiping her paw clean from all the debris it collected.

She felt blissful, and allowed herself to giggle - giggle, not snicker - as she felt you tickling her paw.

Then, it came the moment when you began rubbing her paw-pad, pressing your hands into the smooth flesh.

She gave a surprised cry at first, but soon found pleasure in the sudden feeling.

"Keep goin' master," she moaned,
"That feels wonderful."

--

It took you nearly an hour before Aki was finally satisfied with your massage and asked you to transfer yourself to her other paw, which still lacked attention and, according to Aki, ‘felt lonely’.

After another hour of constant rubbing, you pulled back, your arms sore from all the petting you've been doing.

You felt satisfied though: this was a dream came true, and felt flattered each time you made Aki moan from your massage.

By the time you were done, her paws were rid of all the dust and grass they once had collected, and Aki herself had a blissful expression on her face.

Which was soon replaced by disappointment when she saw you stepping back,

"D'Aww..."

Before you could offer a justification for your abrupt halt, Aki's muzzle pinned you to the leather texture of the couch.

Your body began moving up and down along the movements of the giantess' face.

"That was amazing!" she chimed.

You pushed back the massive wall of slate-grey fur.

"This wasn't like me, huh?" you recalled,
"Why, is this like you?"

Aki suddenly stopped, and you felt her cheek flaring up before it was lifted from your body.

The Zorua offered an awkward smile, before she lowered her head again, her paws circling you; they pushed you back into Aki's cheek.

"Thanks. This was..." she started, but interrupted herself while you felt yourself being surrounded by smoothness and warmth.

You smiled.

"I think the word you are seeking for would be, ‘special’." you chimed, placing a hand on her large cheek and beginning to pet that as well.

Your pokemon remained silent, but nodded as a happy expression appeared on her face, her cheek brushing against you as her head moved up and down.

Silence fell between you and the dark-type, a wonderful silence.

It was perfect.

You didn't need words, you were communicating your feelings to Aki with your heart alone, and she did the same.

After a while though, she broke the silence,

"So... this was pretty fun!" she chimed, back to her usual self.

"Yep." you agreed,
"But we've got still a lot to do," it was the first time you mentioned your fetish out loud, and discovered that you didn't particularly care while in presence of Aki.

"What is next?"

Again, the familiar from you loved and dreaded appeared on the goddess' face.
1153321211122.title: Pet 'n cuddle

choices: Aki stood on her hind legs, presenting her dripping sex to you...
Aki turned around, showing you her bottom...
11533212111223.content:
The unnerving and at the same time wonderful grin lingered on Aki's face as she stared at you, eyes sparkling mischievously as her mind came up with countless ways to continue this game of yours.

To anyone, it would have looked adorable to see the vixen smiling that way, but to you that grin could mean nothing good.

And you loved it. So far, Aki was perfect and you felt eager to continue, though you would have never admitted it.

And then, she finally spoke, her voice coming down on you like it was an angel talking to you. A rowdy, perverted angel.

"Didn't you mention you wanted to take this... further?" she mused, her grin glued to her face.

"Yep. I really did." you confirmed, eagerly nodding your head for good measure, causing Aki to snicker loudly.

"Eager, ain't ya master?" she said, her muzzle inching closer to you. A wave of hot air began blowing past you gently as Aki slowly lowered herself, taking as much time as possible to accomplish the task.

Then, after a whole minute, she was finally able to make eye contact with you, despite you being as tall as one of her pupils.

You could see your own reflection in her humongous eyes, a teeny little human lost in an endless, quiet light blue sea.

"Well, I certainly have a few ideas. Though I'll need you to trust me fully on this. Do you?" she asked.

You never thought you were going to speak these words,

"Of course Aki, I blindly trust you." you said without hesitation.

Aki grinned, before her lips covered her teeth; her tongue poked out of her mouth and it slid across her lips slowly, much like it had been doing earlier.

"Let me rephrase that. Y'know, just makin' sure." she continued, each word sending waves of her breath blowing past you,
"Do you trust that I won't hurt you in any way while I'm doing this?"

You stepped forward, leaning forward and kissing Aki's cheek, which grew a pink shade while you got a mouthful of dark fur.

You had to spit out a particular thick strand in order to be able to talk,

"Aki, I do trust you. You've been incredibly good with this thing so far, so I trust you'd never do anything to put my life in danger," you said, blushing as well,
"Not after all that has happened between us in the past few hours."

The mention made Aki blush furiously, but her grin remained, a loving spark appeared in her eyes.

"Perfect." she spoke.

Without adding another word, her mouth came forward. You watched as her lips puckered and pressed themselves onto your form.

The touch of her soft lips on your body felt incredible; the large pair was incredibly soft, it was like being embraced by a cloud while their warmth transferred to you.

Aki held the kiss for a whole minute, though to you felt a lot more.

Then, the giantess' lips began traveling upwards, until they slid past your chest, neck, face and stopped on top of your head.

Then, Aki's mouth gaped open.

You barely had time to process what was going on before her lips closed gently closed around your head.

In any other circumstances, you would have probably freaked out from the sheer fear of being decapitated by the razor-sharp fangs that occupied the slippery cave that was the Zorua's mouth.

But Aki was being extremely careful: slowly, she began sucking the rest of your body inside of her oral cavity.

Your upper body was slowly being sucked inside as well; you closed your eyes, enjoying the feeling of Aki's warm insides, not even caring about the saliva raining on top of you.

Your chest and arms were pulled inside, and Aki's mouth stopped at your waist. You laid your head on her tongue as it licked and tasted you.

"Master, you sure taste good~" Aki moaned, a wave of sound falling on you while you were sucked inside, this time up to your knees.

1153321231.title: Sneasel/Weavile

11533212311.content:
Hot. Humid. Torture. Another summer day comes along, and you wish that your AC was actually functional for perhaps the thousandth time this season. Normally you would be cuddling up with your nice, cold Sneasel, but she said that she found something she wanted to check out on her own while you two were returning from your daily walk and training session of battling young, inexperienced trainers. But before you could ask her what it was, she grabbed her handmade, wooden handbag and went out the door. You just hope that she wasn't going to steal something and get caught.

Again.

Seriously, her pulling that stunt and trying to steal that fresh, diamond ring from a recently engaged lass a week almost got you put in the slammer with ol' Bubba, and ol' Bubba likes younguns like you, sweetie-- you quickly shake off your train of thought. This scorching weather was driving you and your head balls to the wall, and as you lie on your couch, at this point stripped down to nothing but the bare minimum of your whitey tighties, you briefly wonder if it was going to be your death bed before you suddenly hear a knock, then the door opening to your little, grinning Pokemon.

"Hi master, I'm back! ...heh, look at ya, already stripped down for me and everything!" Your pink Pokemon teases with a smirk, even giving a little wolf whistle at you. At this point, you were unfazed by the way she spoke. She was always the kind to tease and be a mischievous little thing, but at the same time she was by far the sweetest Sneasel you could ever ask for, and not just because she was a shiny Pokemon, either. No, she always cared about you and your well-being with a smile and a jolly spring in her step. In fact, she's how you manage to have a roof over your head, and she knows it. She gets you money and free stuff, and you pamper her like a pretty little princess... though, maybe you've been pampering her a little too much, given how she was just a tad bit chubbier than other Sneasels.

You roll your eyes and smile at her as she kicks the door behind her, walking towards you with that wooden bag she took along as you sit up on the couch and go to gently ruffle her head, raising an eyebrow at all of the blueberries she picked. The bag was nearly full of 'em! "Surprise! Delicious-looking, aren't they?" she asks. "I think I deserve extra belly rubs for this, actually! These are very special and rare berries, I planted and raised them myself. These lil' things... well, I'm not gonna say. it's supposed to be a surprise! Go on, try one, tell me what you think!" She winks at you, with you just tilting your head in confusion. You always felt like you could trust your Sneasel at any given time, but she was a definite prankster. At the same time though, maybe this was supposed to be a genuine gift, and it'd be rude to say no, especially after she made these herself, just for you.

You pop one of the blueberries into your mouth and slowly chew... it has a tart and wild flavor to it. You couldn't lie, though it tasted nice, it was just incredibly plain, and here she was hyping it up like it was the new sliced bread. As you pop another one into your mouth and smile at her, you just have to wonder...
Was she always this tall?
No... she was growing right before your eyes! And so was your couch and everything else! Or you were just shrinking, that seems like more logical explanation. Your Sneasel just smiles at you as you suddenly realize what's going on, and she suddenly explains by the time your head could only reach up to her slightly pooched tummy, "They're minimize berries! The origin of how our species learned Minimize, master! You like 'em? ...at first, you weren't sure what to think, but before you could reply she suddenly hugs you, pressing your face gently into her.

And all was right with the world. You could feel her cool touch break the summer heat, and as you lie in her embrace you can't help but just barely manage to wrap your arms around her, pressing your face into her soft, fluffy belly. Her paw reaches down to pet your head. "I'll take that as a yes."

((Continue with this storyline?))
11533212311.title: Life with your Shiny Sneasel
