The Honchkrow dodges and flies to Melody, but she takes him by surprise and uses close combat. The Honchkrow is sent flying back and he growls angrily before using his heat wave. Melody turns around and plucking you to her chest. She is hit on her back and she grits her teeth in pain "You're tough!" she exclaims before an idea crosses her mind. Melody then start to sing her signature Relic Song; she sings sweetly and the Honchkrow can't help but feel drowzy. Within minutes he is asleep, crash landing on a rock before asleep. Melody then smiles as she yawns loudly before looking at you and kissing your face before starting to fly back to the center.
1313122121222122121122222212121.title: Moonlight troubles

choices: The both of you decide to go back to sleep
You decide to get a 'midnight' snack
13131221212221221211222222121211.content:
It's late in the night when Melody finally manages to reach the pokemon center. She flies in front of the window of your room and opens it before flying in. She then flies over the bed and lies under the blankets "Ouch!" Melody suddenly exclaims getting up. She then touches her back before gritting her teeth in pain. Melody then looks at you before laying you under the blankets and kissing your face softly "Good night my little master" she says sweetly. She then reaches for your bag and starts digging into it "Stupid Honchkrow" Melody mutters "I got burned by his heat wave". She's sure that you have a burn heal somewhere in the bag. She finally pulls the spray out and tries to spray her back, but she can't reach it " Urgh! It would be easier if I had fingers! " she silently exclaims, careful to not wake you up. While she tries to heal her burn, a thought crosses her mind 'I put my master in danger" she thinks, almost crying. What she doesn't know is that the spraying noise woke you up. You open your eyes and look at Melody "Melody?" you call out, getting her attention. Melody looks over you "Master? Are you awake?" she asks "Yeah" you answer. Your eyes adjust to the darkness and you notice the bottle in Melody's hand "Melody, what are you doing with that burn heal?" you ask. The giant Meloetta seems to freeze at this "Oh nothing.." she says "Melody" you insist "What happened? How did you got burned?" "What makes you think I got burned? Silly master" Melody asks pretending to giggle "The heal burn" you answer "Melody, come on, tell me!" you finally explode. Melody sighs and puts the bottle down "OK" she says.
~
"You're saying that after I went to sleep, a Honchkrow attacked you and you got burned?" you ask shocked. Melody can just nod; you notice she's almost about to cry. You two remain silent for a few moments, before you speak up "I have and idea" you says "What?" Melody asks "Go get that burn heal, I'll heal you. I'm still a trainer after all" you say laughing "Yeah, a tiny, sweet trainer" Melody says giggling before getting up and getting the bottle before laying down in front of you. She then hands you the spray; you get on her back "Owwww!" Melody exclaims in pain "Sorry" you say before starting to spray her burn. It's not easy as the bottle is really heavy, but eventually you manage to heal he burn "Much better!" the green headed giantess sighs happily before lifting you from using psychic, then she gets up and sits down, setting you on her lap "Thank you, my little master" she says sweetly. Eventually...

choices: Yawning. Time to go back to bed
Looking over the window, it's dawn.
131312212122212212112222221212112.content: "You know, I'm in the mood for a... midnight snack" Melody says, her stomach grumbling in confirmation "Midnight? But it's 3 AM" you say. Just as you say this, your stomach grumbles loudly. You grab it and blush fiercely as Melody laughs "Were you saying?" she says cheerfully before picking you up from her lap "Come on let's get a snack" "But how?" you ask "That's simple, you already know that I can turn invisible" she replies hugging your tiny form. Her bigger form then disappears, but you can still feel her, meaning she is invisible "Master? Where did you go?" Melody says giggling. You chuckle as Melody flies to the door and opens it before flying down in the pokemon center. You can see almost nothing as the room is completely dark, but Melody doesn't seem to worry about it. She wanders around for a few minutes before stopping in front of a door. The kitchen. The giantess flies in and searches for the fridge; she eventually finds it and opens the door, light immediately shining out. You can see some oran berry juice, some Lava Cookies and a bowl of macaroons. Melody turns visible again and you see her eyes widening "You see what I see master?" she says licking her lips. She then lifts everything with her psychic and closes the door of the fridge. Melody then puts you on her shoulder, then she picks the juice in right hand, the cookies in the left and the macaroons on her head "Is someone here?" a sleepy voice suddenly says. You freeze and so does Melody. Light suddenly fills the room, revealing an half asleep Nurse Joy. The nurse looks around the room, just to see nothing, as Melody quickly turned invisible again; you notice her body sweating and she bits her lip, while trying to keep the balance of the macaroons on her head. Nurse Joy eventually shudders and shuts the light down, before getting back to her room. Melody sighs loudly in relief, before getting back to your room. She enters in the open door and sets you and the food on the bed, before quietly closing the door and turning visible and sitting down in front of you "Eat up master!" she beams biting in a cookie. You also dig in; first you eat a cookie, then a single macaroon, then washing them down with a river (to you) of juice. After eating, you feel like you're going to throw up as what it was a little snack to Melody, it was a full three meals. The green headed pokemon gently rubs your belly "That was a good snack, wasn't it?" she asks smiling. You sigh happily as Melody giggles before she....
131312212122212212112222221212112.title: Midnight snack

1313122121222122121122222212121122.content: Melody is about to speak, when light shines through the room. Your giant pokemon looks over the window: it's dawn. You look at the clock and see it's now 6 AM. Melody looks at you and smiles brightly "Would you believe this? We didn't sleep all night long! Like a slumber party!" she says giggling "If we played some games, that would've been a real slumber party" you say smiling. Melody puts a hand on your head "Just wait until tonight cutie~" she says in a seductive voice. You blush and this only makes Melody giggle harder "Believe me when I say you're the cutest master ever" she says leaning and kissing your cheek. This has the only effect to make you blush fiercely, your face completely red. You two then remain silent for a bit, and your blush eventually fades. After a while, Melody finally speaks up "Well, since we already had breakfast, why don't we play a morning game?" she says "What game?"you ask "Um... Let me think... Well we could play truth or dare again.... Or we could... You know... do THAT again" she says. You blush again at the last as you know that 'THAT' means she wants to mate again "So my little master cutie~, which is gonna be? Truth or dare, or you know what?" she says seductively while winking at you. You take your time thinking of what to do "I think we could.... Uhhhhh.... Let me think..." you say. A good fifteen minutes pass; it's now 7 am, and you're still thinking. Melody's cheerful expression dropped a while ago, and now she's bored out of her skull "Gee master, you're slow" she says "Yeah, I got this... I know let's... Let me think" you say again 'Let's make things interesting' Melody thinks "Well, hurry up, because you have one minute before I decide for you master" she says flashing you with a grin "Ehy no fair... Uhhhh... Let me think... I can't decide under pressure...." you say "30 seconds, hurry up~" she says "Uh yeah, I choose.... I choose..." you still can't decide "10, 9, 8, 7" Melody counts "Uhh.. Uhhh" you say "1" "Oh fine! I choose....
1313122121222122121122222212121122.title: Morning comes

13131221212221221211222222121211221.content:
"Oh fine! I choose truth or dare!" you exclaim "Good choice!" Melody says lifting herself and sitting in front of you. The giant Meloetta fills all your view. You sit down as well "You first master" Melody says. You sigh "Truth or dare?" you ask "Dare" Melody answers. This takes you aback, but you then grin "Very well, I dare you to take a leaf from outside and then keep it in your mouth for two minutes" you say "What?!" Melody exclaims "This or it's a point for me" you say "Don't even think about it, master" she says flying out of the window. She returns shortly after holding a leaf. She closes her hand and brings the leaf to her open mouth with shaking hand. After a brief moment of hesitation, she drops the leaf in. The bitter flavor makes her shiver. Two minutes pass as she quickly spits the leaf out "Gross!" she says rubbing her tongue with her hands. You laugh heartily at this "Oh, you're having fun? Well, now it's my turn" Melody says grinning, while getting in front of you. She almost touches your head with hers as she speaks "Truth or dare, master?" she asks "Truth" you say. Melody's grin grows wider "Remember when you licked my... *ahem*... twice? How was the flavor?" she asks. You blush red at this "What?!" you say "You heard me. How was the flavor?". Your blush grows wider "So?" she asks again "It... It was sweet yet... salty" you say, your face becoming fully red. Melody bursts into laughter "Funniest thing I ever heard. Eheheheh" she says, unable to stop her laughter "Oh yeah? My turn again" you say as Melody quickly recomposes "Very well" she says "Truth or dare?" "Truth" she says. You exactly know what to ask "Did you ever do something weird that involved me?" you ask. Melody's smile drops at this "Well.." she says "Well?" "There would be something..." she says "And...?" you ask again. Melody sighs "Well, I've, for a long time, been... fantasizing about... you" she says "What?!" you say confused "That's right. When I discovered you had a shrinking fetish, I started fantasizing of how would have been if my master was so tiny to be literally in my hands. And now I know. So I started working on the song that shrank you down a while ago. And here we are" she says, and it's now her turn to blush wildly "I had no idea" you say.

"Yeah. But come on, game's still on! Truth or dare?" she asks "Dare!" you say "I dare you to give me a foot rub" she says "Fine you say. She places her toeless feet in front of you, and you start rubbing them. You smell a good odor, which comes from her feet. This must be that blueberry lotion that Melody is used to use every now and then. She lets loose a moan every now and then " You're doing... Great... Keep going" she says between moans. You continue rubbing her feet until she stops you "That's enough" she says picking you up and kissing your upper body lightly "Thank you" she whispers nuzzling you to her white face. You hug her cheek in response, this makes her blush and giggle. She then lowers you on her lap, staring at you lovingly, before speaking "Come on, game's still on. Your turn" she says softly. The game goes on for many rounds, and between funny or embarrassing truths and dares, time passes quickly, until you look to a clock, and see it's now 10 AM. Melody notices too "Whoa, time flies when you're having fun. What do you want to do next master?" asks "Well, I'd like to...
13131221212221221211222222121211221.title: Truth or dare

choices: Skip to the end of the day
131312212122212212112222221212112211.content:
"I'd like to resume our journey Melody" you say "Really?" Melody says "I really like it around here" "Me too, but I also want to resume traveling. Plus, we can't stay here forever, or they'll discover us." you say. Melody puts a hand to her chin, and she seems to be thinking "I think you're right. We can't stay here forever. And plus, traveling is fun. Fine by me!" Melody says smiling "When do we leave?" you ask. "What about now? I'll go get your bag" she says. True to her word, she goes get your bag, then she comes back and picks you up; she kisses you softly and puts you in her green hair, before flying to the door and opening it. She then flies down in the pokemon center. She greets Nurse Joy one last time before flying out of the center. She then looks around to make sure nobody sees her and plucks you out of her hair and smiles at you, before putting you on her head "Come on, let's go" she says starting to fly .
~
It's a while you two are flying for a while now. You are silent, thinking about what will be your next destination, when Melody's voice snaps you out of your thoughts "Look at this master" she says pointing to a bush of flowers. You look up to see many Vivillon's flying around them. The beautiful vision makes you smile "Enchanting, isn't it?" Melody says with a massive smile "Yeah" you say, as Melody flies past them.
~
You've been flying for about three hours now, and Melody starts to get tired "Master?" she calls out "Yeah?" "Can we take a break? I'm tired" she says "Yeah, why not. Why don't we also get lunch? It's lunchtime" you reply "Oh, that isn't necessary" Melody replies "What do you mean?". Melody points to a bush in response. You see many oran berries covering it and lick your lips. Melody then puts you down and picks as much berries as she can, before flying back to you " Eat up master!" she beams digging in her part of the meal. You start to dig in your own meal; the berries are mature to the right point, and they're also tasty and juicy.
~
After eating a full three berries, you lay flat on your back on the grass. Melody does as you, and she holds her stomach, filled up "That was good, wasn't it master?" she asks smiling "Yeah, it was delicious" you reply. You two stay silent for a while, just giving your stomach time to digest the food, before your speak up "Do you want to hit the road again?" you ask "Fine by me" she replies standing up and picking you up "Come on, let's go!" she says determined, before starting to fly again.
131312212122212212112222221212112211.title: Resume our journey

choices: The next morning, the journeys reusmes
1313122121222122121122222212121122112.content:
You and Melody have been flying around all day since lunch, enjoying the sweetness and the beauty of nature. But eventually, much to your disappoint, the sun begins to set down "Look at the sun setting master. Isn't it beautiful?" Melody asks, her eyes widening in amazement. And in fact, the sky is now really beautiful, as the setting sun is coloring it orange and purple "Yeah, indeed it is" you say smiling at the gorgeous show "But we better find a place to sleep" you then say "Okay" Melody says, tightening you in a hug and starting to fly again. After fifteen minutes, the sun is completely settled as Melody flies in front of a rather large tree "What do you think master? Can we sleep here?" she asks. You examine the tree to see if some pokemon lives in it, as even just a Pachirisu would be a possible danger "Yeah, it is safe" you confirm. Melody nods and flies up to the tree, then she lies down on a branch and yawns "*yawn* we really enjoyed the day, didn't we master?" she asks smiling contently "Yeah, it was fun" you admit. Melody giggles and kisses your forehead, before laying you on her chest.

You look up in the sky, just to see a huge moon that lightens the whole land "Look Melody" you say pointing to the sky. Melody does as commanded and looks up "Ohh" she exclaims "The sky is so beautiful!" she says with a massive smile painted on her face. This makes you smile as well as Melody mumbles something "Perfect conditions..." she whispers "What?" you ask. Melody starts singing in answer; sure, you've been listening to Melody singing lots of times, but she never singed like now, with a happiness in the voice that overjoyed your heart. You almost feel to get up and dance. Meanwhile, the sound of Melody's voice makes other pokemon to come; they stop under the tree and look up in amazement to the singing green haired pokemon. Melody notices this and sings with more passion in response. After a while, she finally stops singing, and the pokemon down the tree cheer loudly " Thank you all~" Melody whispers, then she looks at you "So? How was that?" "It was... Incredible..." you say, still under trance. Melody giggles harder at this "I really have you under my spell, uh master? Ehehehe" Melody says still giggling. But she cuts herself off, yawning loudly. A red blush appears on her white face, as Melody puts a hand to her mouth. She then giggles one last time "I think it's bedtime, right master?" she asks you "Yeah, me too" you say yawning; this day has really tired you out. You look down and see the various pokemon that were here before have left, certainly to go sleep too. You yawn and lay down on Melody's chest, while she covers your body with her hair "The best bed you'll ever have" Melody whispers one last time, just before you close your eyes. And, within minutes, you fall asleep. Melody notices this and kisses your head softly, careful to not wake you up. She then lies down on the branch and smiles brightly "Good night my little master, love you" she says closing her eyes. She must be as tired as you, because after five minutes, she falls dead asleep.
1313122121222122121122222212121122112.title: Skip to the end of the day

choices: Come on, let's go find something to eat!
Let's go for the pokemon center!
13131221212221221211222222121211221122.content:
It's late in the night. You are heavily asleep on Melody's chest, this time your dreams much better than the ones you did the last few nights. Melody, on the other hand, isn't having dreams as good as yours; in fact, in the dream, she opens her eyes to find herself sitting on a bed, in front of a normal sized you, who is giving her the back. He seems slightly taller than before "Master! You're back to your normal size?" she says with a curious expression. You turn around and look at her with a weird expression "Normal size? What are you talking about?" you ask "Didn't you say that you wanted to be tiny forever?" Melody asks again, more and more confused "Tiny? You're the one being tiny right now, if you ask me" you reply. Melody looks at you with a weird look before looking around. She notices that everything is huge. Her jaw shuts open "But.. How?" is all she manages to say "No clue. But the point is another one" dream you replies. Melody looks with a curious expression "You see Melody, since you're so small, I... don't have any other use for you. You can't fight like this, so..." you say picking out a pokeball. Melody recognizes it as hers; she didn't enter that thing from ages. She looks in shock as you put it on the ground and crush it with your foot "This is a goodbye" you finish. Melody looks shocked for a few moments, before bursting in tears "Ma- master..." she says crying "Don't need to call me like that now. Goodbye" you say turning around and starting to walk away. Tears pour down Melody's face as she tries to follow you; she falls from the bed and notices she barely reaches your heel "Master... please... I love you..." she says crying, but you can't hear it anymore now.
~
Melody's eyes shut open as she gets up and sits down on the branch she is on, then she starts crying. She covers her eyes with her hands as tears fall from her eyes. Unknown to her, you have fallen on her lap and her tears fall on your head. You open your eyes slowly and hear the sound of someone crying. You look up to see Melody crying "Melody why are you crying?" you ask worried. Melody looks at you for a brief moment, with her eyes filled with tears, before picking you in her arms and tightening you full force in a hug to her chest. You almost run out of air, but fortunately Melody feels this and softens her grip "Melody, why are you crying? Come on, tell me" you ask again, but she still doesn't answer as she keeps sobbing and sniffing. You clearly need to calm her down, so you hardly free yourself from her hug and start climbing her body "Wha- what are you doing *sniff*?" Melody asks as you hardly get on her head. She doesn't try to stop you. You sit down on the white "ground" that is her forehead and start petting her long, green hair "It's okay, I'm here, don't cry anymore" you whisper sweetly. Melody keeps crying for a few more minutes before finally calming down "What happened Melody? Why were you crying?" you ask again. Melody sniffs deeply, before picking you from her head; she looks at you for a bit, before kissing your face deeply. She then pulls off, leaving a completely blushing you. She sits you on her lap "Okay, I'll explain everything" she says sighing.
~
"That's horrible!" you say shocked. Melody nods sadly as you continue "You dreamt about an evil me that abandoned you because you were somehow shrunk?" "Yeah" Melody confirms "Melody, that's horrible. I don't even know how can you dream about such thing. I would never do that, even if you were actually shrunk" you say. Melody smiles a little "I know, but that nightmare somehow crossed my mind" she explains "It's not your fault. Would a hug make you feel better?" you ask. Melody doesn't answer; she simply looks at you with a massive smile, before wrapping her arms around your small form and closing it in a tight hug. You return it with a smile as Melody leans closer "Thank you" she whispers. She then kisses you on the cheek. At least she intended to kiss your cheek, but in reality, she kissed the whole right side of your head, covering it in drool "Whoops! Sorry!" she says "Don't apologize, I'm used to it by now" you say smiling, causing her to giggle. You then yawn loudly and so does Melody "*Yawn* I think we should go back to sleep" Melody says "Yeah, but have I to sleep on your chest again?" you ask smirking "You better, or else" Melody replies with a grin "Or else whaaaa-" you can't even finish that she grabs you and lies down again, then she lies you between her breasts before covering, as always, your body with her hair "Or else I'll make you ~" she says in a singsong voice. You chuckle and look up in the sky to see that the moon is still shining. It must be 4 or 5 AM. Melody yawns again "Good night master" she says leaning closer to your head "Thank you again" she whispers in your ear, before playfully kissing it. You smile a little as you close your eyes. Melody closes her eyes too. Minutes pass fast, and by that time, you both are already dead asleep.
~
Eventually, dawn comes, and the sun's first rays begins to shine, as the day slowly replaces the night. Light blazes into your eyes. You slowly wake up and open your eyes. You find yourself in the same position as you were the last night, still on Melody's chest. You sit up "About the time, master" comes Melody's voice. You look up to her as a pair of black hands comes to grab you. Instantly, you are brought up to her face "Good morning master!" Melody beams with her usual smile "Good morning, Mel- ahhhh" you don't get to finish that her large white lips start to smooch you all over. You almost run out of air as Melody stops "Urgh... What was that for?" you ask blushing "Well, I had to thank you somehow. I slept like an angel after you helped me" she explains giggling "That's nothing. You helped me with my nightmares, so it was only fair to return the favor" you say "Awwwww, aren't you just the sweetest little master cutie ever" Melody says kissing you once again, just making you to blush more. You stare at each other for a bit, before a loud noise is heard nearby, making the Pidgey's flee. You and Melody blush simultaneously, knowing what that noise is: it's both your and her stomach grumbling, asking for their daily first meal "We should search for breakfast" you say "That, or we could resume our journey and eat a yummy lunch at the pokemon center" Melody says, watering at the thought of the food. You sigh as Melody's stomach grumbles again "I need yummy in my tummy" Melody says giggling. You chuckle before answering...
13131221212221221211222222121211221122.title: Melody's nightmare

131312212122212212112222221212112211222.content:
"Well, I'd say let's go for the pokemon center" you say, making Melody smile happily "Pokemon Center it is" she says lifting herself from the branch. She then picks you up and puts you on her head "Hang on tightly, master" she warns, picking your bag up with psychic. She then slowly makes her way to the ground; you still grasp her hair as tight as you can though. Melody stops at inches from the ground and looks around confused. You notice this "What's up Melody?" you ask "Uh, well, you see... I don't know which way to take...." she replies with a small blush on her face. You silently laugh to yourself, before answering "That way, Melody" you say pointing to south. Melody smirks "Thanks master. Oh, and laughing silently doesn't work with me. I read your mind~" she says. This time a blush appears on your face, while Melody laughs, as she starts flying towards the direction you pointed, with your bag 'following' close. Eventually your blush fades and you stop grasping Melody's hair as you sit down on her head, enjoying the morning breeze. Melody starts humming to herself, though the sound doesn't escape your ears. You feel comfy and relaxed, with the sweet sound, the small wind and the softness of the 'ground'; you almost feel to drift off to sleep.

After about an hour of riding on your Meloetta's head, Melody turns her attention to you "Master?" she calls out "Yes?" "How far it's the pokemon center?" she asks "I think it's still half and an hour" you reply. Melody groans at your statement "I'm hungry! When will you teach me teleport?" she asks annoyed "Too bad, Meloetta can't learn it" you reply laughing. Melody groans again as she lowers her head, closing her eyes. You fall from her head "Melody!" you scream. Her eyes shut open as you fall right in her hands "Phew! That was close!" you say, staring at Melody's sorrowful face "Sorry!" she apologizes "Don't be, it was accident" you say smiling. Her face instantly lights up, as she puts you on her head again "I'll be more careful this time" she says. You smile as you start petting her hair.

After what seems forever, you finally manage to see the orange roof of the Pokemon Center "Melody! Look!" you say. Melody squeals happily as she fastens her flying. Within minutes, she is in front of the door. She pushes you in her hair, making sure nobody can see you, and flies in. She goes to Nurse Joy's desk "Good morning" Melody says smiling "Good morning to you, Melody" the pink haired nurse says with a smile "How do you know my name?" Melody asks "Well, my sisters said a lot about you and your trainer" the nurse says smiling "Speaking of which, where is he?" she asks. Melody sweat drops, and so do you. Melody mutters something under her breath "I'm sorry?" Joy asks "Well, I said that he sent me here first while he stopped in the forest. I heard him talking about a rare herb or something. He'll eventually come" she quickly improvises. The nurse looks at her before shrugging "Anyway, could I have some breakfast, please? I have to meet up with my master outside" Melody asks "Sure" the nurse says disappearing into a room. She comes back after a minute, holding a bag "Here you go" she says handing it "Thanks!" Melody says picking the bag "See you around Nurse Joy" she says flying outside "Thanks for coming here" the nurse waves her goodbye. Melody looks around to make sure nobody is looking at her before flying towards the forest. She sits down against a tall tree and pulls you out of her hair "So? Do we have breakfast?" you ask "Right here" your Meloetta says showing you the bag. Melody sits you next to her and opens the bag, revealing some Lava Cookies, a small bottle of moo moo milk and various kinds of berries. Melody waters at the food beside her...
131312212122212212112222221212112211222.title: Let's go for the pokemon center!

1313122121222122121122222212121122112222.content: Melody, who is still watering from her mouth, hands you a cookie "Dig in" she says taking one of herself "Ladies first" you reply with a smile. Melody lets out a cute giggle "Aren't you just a little gentleman~?" she says, leaning to bite her cookie... somehow she ends biting her own teeth "Ouch!" she exclaims, looking for whatever took her cookie. It doesn't take long to spot a rather large Pidgeot, crumbs falling from it's mouth "Hey! That was my breakfast you!!" she shouts annoyed. She always hates when someone steals her food. The Pidgeot completely ignores her "Urgh! Not the way to treat a lady!" Melody yells again. You see the Pidgeot snickering. You crack a smile and start to chuckle. Unluckily for you, Melody notices "What are you laughing about?" she says angrily "Melody, you should calm down. It's no big deal" you say. The Pidgeot seems to just notice you "Hello there snack" it speaks, sounding female. In an instant, she flies at you and lands mere inches from you. You don't even have the time to think as the Pidgeot lowers her beak. Too bad for her, Melody is fast to think and holds her, before using power up punch and throwing her far "Don't you dare" she says angrily, while picking you up. She smiles briefly at you "This is for sure a BIG deal, uh master?" she says. Even though the situation, you manage to smile a little as she saved you. Again. But the Pidgeot gets back on her talons and charges at you two again. Melody puts you in her hair "You'll be safe there" she whispers, before using close combat. She hits her harshly, but the Pidgeot is still fighting. She uses brave bird, but Melody dodges and the bird crashes in a tree, fainting. Melody looks for a few moments before sighing in relief "Whoa! That wasn't much of a chore, was it master?" she says pulling you out of her green hair "Yeah, I owe you" you say "Don't even say that" she replies nuzzling you "Come on, we have a breakfast to finish" she then says "Yeah, but I think we'll better finish it somewhere else. This place is too... loud" you say. Melody just nods and turns her attention to the bag where the breakfast is. Just to find out a wild Rattata is eating it. "Okay, Azelf, I think we can call it a day." you call out to your pokemon, while glancing at the sky. Sun is in fact about to settle down, and the moment has come for you and your beloved pokemon to go back home, after the usual day of training.

The pokemon in question has a small, blue body with a star shaped, dark blue head. She has golden eyes and two tails. A red gem is on her forehead, two similar gems on her tails.

Azelf, who is floating a few meters in front of you, flies over you, quietly sitting on your shoulder with a smile.
"Quite the training today, right master?" she asks as you start walking. You nod, smiling.
"Indeed. You're getting even stronger, Azelf. And I just have a bowl of ice cream with your name on it." you say her, getting a cheer in response.


Opening the front door, you step into your house, the same one you and Azelf have been sharing from years. As you turn on the lights, the pokemon floats off your shoulder and goes straight for the couch, while you head into the kitchen, just to return a minute later, holding Azelf's desired prize: a bowl filled with ice cream.

In a matter of minutes, both you and you're pokemon are sitting next to each other, the bowl between you and her. You turn on the TV, while Azelf, not losing any time, digs into the bowl. You give out a sigh as you grab a spoonful of ice cream.

You keep skipping through the TV channels as the ice cream in the bowl disappears spoon after spoon. And, soon, nothing more remains in the bowl. You toss it on the table in front of the couch, while Azelf moves on your lap, snuggling up to you. You start petting her head, making her coo in appreciation.


After a while, you yawn deeply.
"I think I'm going to bed now. Are you coming Azelf?" you ask the blue pokemon.
"Sure." she replies, floating off to let you get up. You turn off the TV and slowly head to your bedroom, Azelf following close.

You literally collapse on your bed, slowly crawling under the sheets. Azelf floats next to you, snuggling up to you once again.
"Good night, Azelf..." are the last words that escape your mouth before you fall unconscious. Azelf gives a smile. Her chance came earlier than she had anticipated.

Her golden eyes start glowing azure, and so do you. When the light dies down after a few minutes, Azelf contemplates her work with a smile.
"Good night, master." she whispers, careful to not wake you up.
"Love you." she closes her eyes and lies her head on your pillow.
‘This is going to be fun.’ she thinks to herself, quietly falling asleep.


Eventually, the moon in the sky is replaced by the morning sun. The dawn's first rays penetrate into the house through the windows, the light getting in your eyes.

Bothered by the feeling, you rub your eyes, before slowly opening them. Your gaze darts around for a moment, trying to spot Azelf on the bed. But she doesn't seem to be here. Weird. She always sleeps with you. The smaller bed you had made for her was, in fact, never used. But where could she be?

Suddenly, you hear a soft noise. It sounds like... snoring. Slowly, you turn in direction of the sound. And a gasp escapes your mouth as you realize where you have been sleeping all night long...
